Name: Attack Order
Description: The user calls upon her swarm and heeds them to charge against you. No matter where you run, they will surround you. Hope you are not allergic to bees.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical.

Name: Bug Bite
Description: The Pokemon nibbles its foe, if it finds something tasty it will eat it in an instant. It may try to eat almost anything.
AdditionalInfo: If the Target Pokemon is holding a berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

Name: Bug Buzz
Description: The Pokemon uses its wings or part of its body to emit sound waves that harm and affect the target.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to reduce foe's Sp. Defense.

Name: Defend Order
Description: A swarm of bugs flies around the user, creating a barrier to protect this Pokemon from damage.
AdditionalInfo: User Increases its Defense and Sp. Defense.

Name: Fell Stinger
Description: The Pokemon stings the target. If the foe is too weakened to move it absorbs part of its power.
AdditionalInfo: If the foe faints due to damage from this attack increase the user's Strength by 2.

Name: First Impression
Description: The Pokemon makes a dramatic entrance to the battlefield, taking the foe by surprise as to who its opponent really is.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 2. This move will only work the First Round the Pokemon is out in battle. From the second round on it will fail automatically.

Name: Fury Cutter
Description: The Pokemon makes use of its claws or scythes to land as many hits as possible.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Heal Order
Description: The Pokemon commands its swarm to bring some healing honey.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal.

Name: Infestation
Description: The Pokemon summons a huge swarm of bugs to prevent the foe from escaping. Sometimes the swarm may take a hit to the foe. The call extends for hundreds of yards.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Leech Life
Description: The user attacks a vital spot and sucks away the vitality of its foe.
AdditionalInfo: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt rounded down.

Name: Lunge
Description: The user charges against the foe at full force, not just to knock it down but to restain it with its many limbs.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce foe's Strength.

Name: Megahorn
Description: The Pokemon uses its strong horn(s) to pierce its foe and deal massive damage.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal Damage.

Name: Pin Missile
Description: The Pokemon showers its foe with stings or spikes that pierce like needles.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Pollen Puff
Description: The Pokemon creates a puff of pollen that explodes on the foe's face and gives them a terrible allergy. When consumed these puffs are sweet and very nutritious.
AdditionalInfo: When this move is used against an ally it will heal 1 HP instead of dealing damage.

Name: Powder
Description: The foe is fully covered with a flammable powder, a source of fire might ignite it with explosive results.
AdditionalInfo: Add 3 Dice of Damage to the next Fire Type attack that hits the target.

Name: Quiver Dance
Description: A mystical and beautiful dance that boosts a Pokemon's dexterity and focus.
AdditionalInfo: Increases Dexterity, Special, and Sp. Defense.

Name: Rage Powder
Description: The Pokemon releases an irritating powder that annoys and enrages foes into attacking.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 2. During this Round, all damage moves from any foe must target the User.

Name: Signal Beam
Description: The user emits an intense light that harms the foes and may leave them dazed like moths.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.

Name: Silver Wind
Description: The Pokemon blows a beautiful silver colered wind that harms the foe, the performance may give the user a big confidence boost.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase User's Strength. Dexterity. Special. Defense. Sp. Defense.

Name: Spider Web
Description: The User quietly releases a web on the field. All foes will be trapped.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks.

Name: Steamroller
Description: The user curls up and rolls at full speed to strike the foe. It may leave the target swatted on the ground.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Sticky Web
Description: The Pokemon quickly covers the arena with a sticky web, newly arrived foes will have trouble moving with ease.
AdditionalInfo: Entry Hazard. Foe Pokemon that enter the battlefield get a Dexterity Reduction of 1. Pokemon with the Levitate ability and Flying Type Pokemon are immune to this effect.

Name: String Shot
Description: The user shoots a silk string that ties and limits the movement of its foe.
AdditionalInfo: Targets All Foes in Range. Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.

Name: Struggle Bug
Description: The Pokemon lays on its back and struggles with the foe, disrupting the foe's concentration.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Special.

Name: Tail Glow
Description: The user emits a strong light. This Pokemon will stare at its brightness to enter a trance.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Special by 3.

Name: Twineedle
Description: The Pokemon stabs the foe with its stinger, claws or spikes infused with poison.
AdditionalInfo: Double action.  Roll 2 Chance Dice to Poison the foe per hit.

Name: U-Turn
Description: The user strikes its foe, then quickly goes back to safety while another party Pokemon takes its place.
AdditionalInfo: The user switches out after dealing damage. The replacement Pokemon arrives to ready to fight. Roll its initiative Switcher Move.

Name: X-Scissor
Description: The Pokemon uses its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors to cut through the foe.

Name: Assurance
Description: The user retaliates against the foe, the rush of adrenaline allows it to hit harder.
AdditionalInfo: If the User has already received damage from the target this Round add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Name: Baddy Bad
Description: The Pokemon acts like a thug and channels its own dark aura as protection for itself and its allies.
AdditionalInfo: If successful, for the next 4 Rounds the User and Allies will receive 1 less damage from Physical Attacks. This effect does not stack. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Beat Up
Description: The user calls other Pokemon to aid it in battle, together they give a beating to the foe.
AdditionalInfo: If the attack is successful, add 2 Dice of Damage for every ally Pokemon that spends an action to help the user perform this move. Up to 3 allies may join.

Name: Bite
Description: The user lands a vicious bite that may leave an ugly bruise.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Brutal Swing
Description: The Pokemon starts attacking at full force with its claws, anyone unfortunate enough to be in its path will end up severely wounded.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Target all Foes in range.

Name: Crunch
Description: The Pokemon uses its fangs to viciously tear whatever it is biting.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Roll 1 Chance Dice to reduce foe's Defense.

Name: Dark Pulse
Description: The Pokemon sends a wave of dark feelings that affect those who are most vulnerable, hurting the foe and leaving it unable to act.
AdditionalInfo: Targets random foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Dark Void
Description: A portal opens and transports all foes to a world of darkness, inside they can't see or feel anything, it's like they are trapped in an eternal slumber.
AdditionalInfo: All Foes in Range have the Sleep condition.

Name: Darkest Lariat
Description: The user swings both of its arms against the target, there's no armor thick enough to stop the strike.
AdditionalInfo: Ignore the the foe's Attribute Increases that would decrease this Move's damage.

Name: Embargo
Description: The user quickly takes out the held item of a Pokemon. It also empties the bag of the trainer and forces everyone to stay away from their own properties. Evildoers master this Move.
AdditionalInfo: The target cannot use its held item nor can its trainer use items on it.

Name: Fake Tears
Description: The user stops battling and feigns to be crying, disrupting the foe's mood to battle and making it lower its guard.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense by 2.

Name: False Surrender
Description: The Pokemon bows in defeat, begging for forgiveness, then backstabs its gullible foe.
AdditionalInfo: Never Fail.

Name: Feint Attack
Description: The Pokemon approaches the foe disarmingly then attacks suddenly without giving any time to react.
AdditionalInfo: Never Fail.

Name: Flatter
Description: The user starts flattering and admiring its opponent. It sure makes it feel good about itself, but why?
AdditionalInfo: Increase the foe's Special. Confuse foe.

Name: Fling
Description: The usr takes its held item and throws it at the opponent. You may get it back after the fight.
AdditionalInfo: Add up to 4 Dice to the Damage Pool, depending on the held item thrown. See P. 432 for more info.

Name: Foul Play
Description: The user feint attacks then tricks the foe who ends up hurting itself.
AdditionalInfo: S.T.A.B of the user and Strength of the foe apply for this move's damage.

Name: Hone Claws
Description: The Pokemon sharpens its claws to perform more precise attacks.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength and Accuracy.

Name: Hyperspace Fury
Description: The Pokemon opens portals to attack with each one of its arms, bypassing all defenses and making it impossible to escape, however, the user's defense also gets neglected.
AdditionalInfo: Never Fail. Ignores the effect of any Shield Move the Foe might have used. Reduce the user's Defense.

Name: Jaw Lock
Description: The user will capture its foe in a crushing jaw grip. It won't let go no matter how much you try to seperate them. The only way it will release its victim is by fainting.
AdditionalInfo: Both User and Target are Blocked.

Name: Knock Off
Description: The Pokemon makes a quick tackle that knocks off anything the foe was holding.
AdditionalInfo: The target Pokemon loses its held item.

Name: Memento
Description: The user unleashes all its remaining power to send a wave of hopeless thoughts to haunt the foe's mind and soul. The target will be left in grief.
AdditionalInfo: The user faints. Reduce foe's Strength. Dexterity. Special. Defense and Sp. Defense by 2. Lasts for a whole scene.

Name: Nasty Plot
Description: The Pokemon starts plotting on how to defeat the enemy. Its evil laugh reveals the bad intentions.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the user's Special by 2.

Name: Night Daze
Description: The user forms a pitch black wave that hurts the foe. This darkness may remain obstructing the target's vision.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 4 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Accuracy.

Name: Night Slash
Description: The user quickly slashes through the target as soon as it gets the chance. The intent to end the target's life is frightening.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. High Critical.

Name: Obstruct
Description: In a reckless action, the user charges against the foe to stop its momentum and block its incoming attack. Being so close allows the user to reach for weak spots.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 4. Shield Move. * If the Foe used a Non- Physical Move against the user, Reduce the Foes Defense by 2.

Name: Parting Shot
Description: The user threatens the foe, leaving it too scared to pursuit the user or overwhelm the ally that just switched in the battlefield.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce foe's Strength and Special. The user switches out, the new Pokemon arrives ready to fight. Roll for its initiative. Switcher Move.

Name: Payback
Description: The Pokemon tackles the target with hatred and vengeance.
AdditionalInfo: Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool if the target already damaged you this Round.

Name: Power Trip
Description: In the heat of the battle, the Pokemon gets carried away, relishing in its own power.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Pool of this Move for every Attribute increase the user has. Up to 7 Dice may be added this way. (ie. the user has 2 increased points on Defense, add 2 Damage dice).

Name: Punishment
Description: The user takes advantage of its foe's strengths to use them against it.
AdditionalInfo: Add up to 7 Dice to the Damage Pool for every Increased Attribute the foe has. (ie. Foe has 1 Increased dice in Dexterity & Strength that equals +2 Dice on the Damage Pool of this attack).

Name: Pursuit
Description: The Pokemon chases the foe to deliver a final blow before it escapes.
AdditionalInfo: If the foe is Switching Out or escaping. Add 2 Dice to the Damage Pool and Priority 1 to this move.

Name: Quash
Description: The user represses the foe with intimidation so it has to think twice before acting.
AdditionalInfo: For the rest of the scene, the target will go last in the order of Initiative.

Name: Snarl
Description: The Pokemon viciously snarls showing its teeth. Its menacing look will make the foe cower in fear.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based. Reduce the foe's Special.

Name: Snatch
Description: The user analyzes the advantages of the foe then makes them their own.
AdditionalInfo: Erase any Increase or Decrease on the foe's Traits, and place them on the User instead.

Name: Sucker Punch
Description: While the foe is preparing its attack, the user takes advantage and strikes.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 1. This move can only be used after the Target rolls a damaging move.

Name: Switcheroo
Description: The user quickly switches the held items before the foe can realize what happened.
AdditionalInfo: User and Foe switch their Held Item. If only one Pokemon is holding an item it gives it away.

Name: Taunt
Description: The user mocks and teases the target to make it attack in a raging fury.
AdditionalInfo: The target Pokemon can only perform Damaging Moves and Evasion actions for the next 4 Rounds.

Name: Thief
Description: The Pokemon strikes its foe and takes the opportunity to steal whatever the target was holding.
AdditionalInfo: The user steals the foe's Held Item.

Name: Throat Chop
Description: A heinous attack to a Pokemon's throat that will leave them unable to make a sound for hours.
AdditionalInfo: The target cannot use any "Sound Based" Move for the rest of the scene.

Name: Topsy-Turvy
Description: The user changes the nature of its target, bad things become good and good things become bad.
AdditionalInfo: Any Decreases on the foe's Attributes become Increases and vice versa.

Name: Torment
Description: The user torments and enrages the foe, making it unable to keep using its strategy.
AdditionalInfo: The target cannot use the same Moves it used during the last Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Breaking Swipe
Description: The Pokemon will use its tail to make a long swipe at its foes. A few cracks are heard, and the foe will limp afterwards.
AdditionalInfo: All Foes in Range. Reduce the Strength of those affected.

Name: Clanging Scales
Description: The Pokemon rattles the scales of its armor creating a frightening noise in the area. Some of its scales fall of as a result, leaving some areas exposed.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based. Reduce User's Defense.

Name: Clangorous Soul
Description: The Pokemon shakes its scales around, to sharpen, shed, and rearrange them. It's a bit rough, but in the end the Pokemon feels more focused for battle.
AdditionalInfo: User deals Damage to itself equal to Half of its total HP rounded down. Increase User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense and Sp. Defense.

Name: Core Enforcer
Description: Zygarde shoots a beam that fractures the target to its core, rendering it unable to sustain even the most basic of its traits.
AdditionalInfo: If successful and the target of this Move has already inflicted damage this Round, remove the Foe's Ability for the rest of the Scene. (Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Stance Change & Shields Down are exceptions)

Name: Draco Meteor
Description: The Pokemon calls a comet that falls from the sky to deal a brutal amount of damage. This feat demands a lot from the user.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Reduce User's Special by 2.

Name: Dragon Breath
Description: The user lets out a mystical green breath that hinders the movement of anyone it touches.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

Name: Dragon Claw
Description: The Pokemon uses its strong claws to deliver a fierce tearing blow.

Name: Dragon Dance
Description: The user performs a vigorous and mystical dance that boosts the fighting spirit and reflexes.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength and Dexterity.

Name: Dragon Darts
Description: The Pokemon's head is a nest for its less evolved forms, the younglings will sometimes be used as projectiles.
AdditionalInfo: Double Action

Name: Dragon Hammer
Description: The Pokemon swings its body as a hammer and leaves the foe nailed to the cracked ground.

Name: Dragon Pulse
Description: The user opens its mouth and sends a powerful wave of energy.

Name: Dragon Rage
Description: A dual colored flame that always leaves the same burn marks on everything it touches.
AdditionalInfo: This moves always inflicts 2 damage.

Name: Dragon Rush
Description: The user charges rapidly against the foe. The strike may leave thetarget gasping for air.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Dragon Tail
Description: This Powerful tail strike can knockdown anyone up to 100 feet away!
AdditionalInfo: Low Priority 1. The target is hit and knocked back to its trainer, stunned. Forcing the trainer to send another Pokemon. In the wild the target is sent away. Switcher Move.

Name: Dual Chop
Description: The Pokemon strikes the foe with brutal blows.
AdditionalInfo: Double Action.

Name: Dynamax Cannon
Description: The Pokemon shoots a heavy projectile, if the foe is under the effects of the Dynamax phenomenon all the energy will be concentrated and explode on the target.
AdditionalInfo: If the Foe is under the effects of Dynamax, This Move becomes Lethal and you add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Name: Eternabeam
Description: The Pokemon shoots an incredibly powerful beam towards the sky. The energy released might keep traveling through space thousands of years later.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Must Recharge.

Name: Outrage
Description: The user awakens their primal instinct as a dragon and unleashes its uncontrollable fury, destroying everything in its path. After that, the Pokemon is left disoriented and confused.
AdditionalInfo: Rampage.

Name: Roar Of Time
Description: Through a terrifying roar, Dialga bounds the forces of time on a single area, the unfortunate target will be trapped in a time warp, growing old in a matter of seconds.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. If successful, the target can't have any action until next Round.

Name: Spacial Rend
Description: With a flicker of its claws, Palkia defragments the space around its foe. Those who survive rarely do peserve their original shape.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. High Critical.

Name: Twister
Description: The Pokemon lets out a spiral current that surrounds the foes. They can't move until they free themselves from this terrible whirlwind.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foes.

Name: Aura Wheel
Description: The Pokemon happily runs into a wheel made of electricity that strikes the foe. If the user is feeling hungry the wheel's energy is replaced by a dark aura.
AdditionalInfo: If successful, Increase user's Dexterity. If the user is in “Hangry” Form this Move is considered to be Dark-Type.

Name: Bolt Beak
Description: The Pokemon charges with its beak and pecks its foe, if the foe is not fast it will be zapped by a jolt of electricity.
AdditionalInfo: If the Target hasn't had a Turn this Round, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool.

Name: Bolt Strike
Description: Zekrom delivers a powerful tackle while discharging lightning through its body. The foe is rendered unable to move, either by the strike or the electricity
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

Name: Buzzy Buzz
Description: The Pokemon releases a jolt of static electricity from its fur, that makes a cute zapping sound. It's all fun and games until somebody gets paralyzed.
AdditionalInfo: Paralyze the foe. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Charge
Description: The user concentrates all the electricity in its body to be released.
AdditionalInfo: Add 2 Dice to the Damage Pool to the next Electric Damaging move the user performs.

Name: Charge Beam
Description: The Pokemon lets out an electric beam then uses the remaining charge to boost its power.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Special.

Name: Discharge
Description: The user releases its stored electricity in all directions.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze those affected.

Name: Eerie Impulse
Description: The user radiates electricity around itself, the foe will think twice about attacking.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce foe's Special by 2.

Name: Electric Terrain
Description: The user electrifies the terrain, making it impossible to get a good night's sleep on it.
AdditionalInfo: For the Next 4 Rounds all Electric Attacks will deal 1 Extra Dice of Damage. Anyone on the ground will be cured from "Sleep" Status.

Name: Electrify
Description: The user hurls an electric projectile to the target, the foe is charged with electricity until it is released by the foe's next attack.
AdditionalInfo: The Damage from the next attack made by the target will be Electric Type.

Name: Electro Ball
Description: The Pokemon creates a small electricity orb that is hurled at the target. If the user is faster, the impact will be bigger.
AdditionalInfo: The user adds 1 Dice to the Damage Pool for every Dexterity point the User has that surpasses the foe's. Up to 4 Dice may be added.

Name: Electroweb
Description: Shoots an electrified web at all foes to restrict their movement. Walking through this web can be painful.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce Dexterity of those affected.

Name: Fusion Bolt
Description: The Pokemon strikes with a devastating electric impact, said impact will grow larger and stronger if there's a special kind of fire nearby.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. If the Move “Fusion Flare” has already been used by anyone this Round, add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this Move.

Name: Ion Deluge
Description: The user amplifies all electrically charged particles in the environment. The results are shocking!
AdditionalInfo: For the rest of the Scene, Normal Type Moves will deal damage as if they were Electric Type Moves.

Name: Magnet Rise
Description: The Pokemon uses the magnetic field of the earth to repel itself from the ground, allowing it to float for a short period of time.
AdditionalInfo: For the Next 4 Rounds the User gains immunity against Ground Type Moves.

Name: Magnetic Flux
Description: The Pokemon bends the magnetic field around itself, this also affects all allies who are sensible to it.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the Defense and Sp. Defense of User and all its Electric and Steel Type Allies.

Name: Nuzzle
Description: The Pokemon rubs its electrified cheeks against the foe, it looks very cute but it can be dangerous.
AdditionalInfo: Paralyze the foe.

Name: Overdrive
Description: The Pokemon uses its own body as an amplifier for the energizing sounds it produces.
AdditionalInfo: All Foes in Range. Sound Based.

Name: Parabolic Charge
Description: The Pokemon lets go of a big electric charge from its body. The charge comes back to it even bigger.
AdditionalInfo: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt to one target, rounded down.

Name: Pika Papow
Description: The User lets out its energy in the form of a lightning strike, the happier the user feels the more energized it will be.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Die to the Damage Roll for every point of Happiness on the User. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Plasma Fists
Description: The user charges its fists with electricity, and upon impact the charge materializes into plasma that adds an electric element to all of its Normal moves.
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. If successful, all Normal-Type Moves of the user will be considered Electric Type until the end of the Scene.

Name: Shock Wave
Description: The user quickly releases jolts of electricity that are too fast for many to react.
AdditionalInfo: Never Fail.

Name: Spark
Description: The user tackles the foe, releasing a powerful spark on contact.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

Name: Thunder
Description: The Pokemon commands a tremendous lightning to strike a specific point on the ground. It's quite dangerous.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze foe. If performed under Sunny Weather, Accuracy becomes -3 instead. If performed under Rain Weather, Ignore this Moves Reduced Accuracy.

Name: Thunder Fang
Description: The user lands an electrified bite on the foe. The direct current may affect the foe greatly.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

Name: Thunder Punch
Description: An Electrified punch to deal a shocking blow.
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze foe.

Name: Thunder Shock
Description: A small electric attack that shocks the foe and may leave it with muscular cramps. Some electric devices hit by this attack will malfunction.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

Name: Thunder Wave
Description: A tide of bright lightning streams from the floor onto the foe. The target's body will be cramped for hours.
AdditionalInfo: Paralyze the foe.

Name: Thunderbolt
Description: A strong electric attack that shocks and harms the foe. It can destroy most kinds of electric equipment.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

Name: Volt Switch
Description: The User quickly shoots an electic jolt, then switches places with an awaiting Pokemon partner at the speed of lightning.
AdditionalInfo: The user switches out after dealing damage. The new Pokemon arrives ready to fight on the next Round. Switcher Move.

Name: Volt Tackle
Description: The user surrounds itself with big bolts of electricity, then it crashes against the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Recoil. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Foe.

Name: Wild Charge
Description: The Pokemon surrounds itself with wild botls of lightning, then tackles recklessly.
AdditionalInfo: Recoil.

Name: Zap Cannon
Description: The user hurls a dreadful bombardment of electric explosions. Anyone hit won't be able to move for a very long time.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Paralyze the Foe.

Name: Zing Zap
Description: The user hurls itself as a zig-zaging ball of electricity that explodes on contact, this leaves the foe unable to move for a few seconds.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.

Name: Zippy Zap
Description: The user zips and zaps from one place to another to strike the foe moving so fast it appears to be teleporting, leaving almost no time to react.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 2. This Move is always a Critical Hit and gets the proper Bonus for it. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Aromatic Mist
Description: The Pokemon showers an ally in a mist with a revitalizing armoa.
AdditionalInfo: Increase one Ally's Defense and Sp. Defense.

Name: Baby-Doll Eyes
Description: Before anyone acts in battle, the user looks at the foe with the cutest eyes.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 1. Reduce foe's Strength.

Name: Charm
Description: The Pokemon uses a cute and harmless attitude to make the foe less wary and aggresive.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce foe's Strength by 2.

Name: Crafty Shield
Description: The Pokemon creates a magic shield to protect everyone from the bad tricks a foe might have under its sleeve. Under this shield, everyone can see dishonesty and bad intentions.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 3. The User and its Allies are protected from the effects of a Support Move. Shield.

Name: Dazzling Gleam
Description: The user shines a powerful flash that hurts the eyes of everyone watching it.

Name: Decorate
Description: Using some frosting the Pokemon decorates their target to look bigger, more powerful, and incredibly delicious!
AdditionalInfo: Increase the Strength and Special of One Ally by 2

Name: Disarming Voice
Description: With a charming and manipulative cry, the user deals emotional damage to its opponent. This move always makes the target feel bad.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based. Never Fail. Targets All foes in range.

Name: Draining Kiss
Description: The user sends a kiss with a flirty intention, the foe catches the kiss but it ends up draining the target's energy.
AdditionalInfo: The User restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.

Name: Fairy Lock
Description: The user moves as if locking a door. It takes a few moments before everyone realizes that they are not really trapped.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks. Last 1 Round.

Name: Fairy Wind
Description: The Pokemon strikes with a wind covered in fairy dust. It causes itching.

Name: Fleur Cannon
Description: A light beam pierces the battlefield, it deals devastating damage but leaves newly grown flowers instead of scorched earth. The user is left feeling very tired.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Reduce User's Special by 2.

Name: Floral Healing
Description: The user creates a flower crown that heals and relaxes its wearer. Under the right conditions this move also creates a flower patch around its target.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. If performed over Grassy Terrain this move is a Complete Heal.

Name: Flower Shield
Description: The Pokemon uses a mysterious power that causes flowers to bloom beneath every Grass Pokemon nearby. Flora in this field is more resilient and beautiful.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the Defense of All Grass Type Pokemon on the field.

Name: Geomancy
Description: Through a mystical connection this Pokemon absorbs the life force of earth itself to increase its power.
AdditionalInfo: Charge Move. The user charges, then Increases by 2 its Dexterity, Special and Sp. Defense scores on its next Turn.

Name: Light Of Ruin
Description: By drawing energy from the Eternal Flower, the Pokemon unleashes all of its hurt. A beautiful light surrounds the area, yet the pain inside of its heart remains.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Recoil.

Name: Misty Terrain
Description: The user surrounds the battlefield with a mystical mist that feels protective. Mythical Pokemon find something eerie about it.
AdditionalInfo: Creatures standing on the battlefield won't be affected by Status Ailments. Dragon Type attacks won't add their Power to the Damage Pool. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Moonblast
Description: Summon power directly from the moon. The Pokemon blasts the foe with light.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Special.

Name: Moonlight
Description: The user gathers power from the light of the moon, the energy absorbed can heal most injuries.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. If performed at Night or Sunny Weather is in effect this move becomes a Complete Heal. If Rain/Sandstorm Weather is in effect this move only heals 1 HP

Name: Nature's Madness
Description: The forces of nature attack as if they had a will of their own. Water will try to drown you, plants will trap you, lightning will come out of nowhere, and even your own body will fail you.
AdditionalInfo: Damage Roll is Half of the Foe's remaining HP (up to 10) Rounded down. If the remaining HP of the foe is 1, this move fails. Ignore the foe's Defenses.

Name: Play Rough
Description: The user and the foe start a playful wrestle, it soon escalates into something not so pretty.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Strength.

Name: Sparkly Swirl
Description: The Pokemon unleashes a swirling and glittery energy that releases a pleasant aroma that soothes the body and has healing properties.
AdditionalInfo: If successful, heal any Status Ailment on the User and Allies. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Spirit Break
Description: Sometimes words hurt a lot more than blows. With this Move the Pokemon deals both.
AdditionalInfo: If successful, reduce the Foe's Special.

Name: Strange Steam
Description: The user releases an addictive sweet-smelling steam, do not be fooled as it is toxic and has nasty side-effects.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Confuse the Foe.

Name: Sweet Kiss
Description: The Pokemon moves towards the foe and plants a delicate kiss on its cheek, then leaves playfully. The foe struggles to know what it meant.
AdditionalInfo: Confuse the foe.

Name: Arm Thrust
Description: The user quickly throws blows of open-palmed thrusts against the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Aura Sphere
Description: The user channels its aura and launches this power in the form of a sphere The foe's aura is hit, leaving the target unscratched but deeply hurt.
AdditionalInfo: Never Fail.

Name: Body Press
Description: The Pokemon makes a judo maneuver, using its body mass instead of its strength against the target.

Name: Brick Break
Description: The Pokemon uses its palm or claws to perform a one-armed chop that shatters even invisible barriers.
AdditionalInfo: If a Barrier is in place on the foe's side (ie. Light Screen, Reflect) destroy the barrier and add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Name: Bulk Up
Description: The Pokemon shows its muscles with intimidating poses to look bigger and stronger.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength and Defense.

Name: Circle Throw
Description: The user throws the target 60 feet out of the battlefield.
AdditionalInfo: Low Priority 1. The target is hit and knocked back to its trainer forcing them to send out another Pokemon. In the wild the target is sent away. Switcher Move.

Name: Close Combat
Description: The user attacks at a close distance to deal lots of damage. The foe is also close enough to attack.
AdditionalInfo: After dealing damage, Reduce the User's Defense and Sp. Defense.

Name: Counter
Description: The user prepares to receive damage, then returns the same damage and more.
AdditionalInfo: This Move can only deal damage if the Foe has dealt Physical Damage to the User this Round. Roll the same Damage Pool as your Foe plus 2 Extra Dice. Ignore the foe's Defenses.

Name: Cross Chop
Description: The user delivers a chop with its arms crossed trying to hot a weak spot.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical.

Name: Detect
Description: The user detects the intentions of the attacker and acts out to minimize the damage.
AdditionalInfo: Priority. Shield Move. Reduce 3 Damage this pokemon would receive from a Damaging Move. Negate effects of Support Moves that target the user. Reduce to zero the set damage from a move the user would take.

Name: Double Kick
Description: The user throws two powerful kicks.
AdditionalInfo: Double Action.

Name: Drain Punch
Description: The Pokemon strikes with a powerful punch. Through contact, it absorbs some vital energy.
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. The user restore HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.

Name: Dynamic Punch
Description: A punch that hits a small pressure point. It leavers the foe disoriented.
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. Confuse the foe.

Name: Final Gambit
Description: The Pokemon puts its last strength into an all-or-nothing attack. After that, it faints.
AdditionalInfo: Ignore the foe's Defenses. The user faints after dealing damage.

Name: Flying Press
Description: The user flies towards the foe from the sky in pure Lucha Libre style.
AdditionalInfo: When Dealing damage with this move, it counts as if this move was also Flying Type.

Name: Focus Blast
Description: The user concentrates and releases a blast of energy.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense.

Name: Focus Punch
Description: A brutal punch that requires calm and concentration
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. Charge Move. The User will flinch if it gets hit before releasing this attack.

Name: Force Palm
Description: A powerful open palm hit that knocks the foe away and may leave him unable to move.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

Name: Hammer Arm
Description: A mighty arm thrust that leaves the user quite tired.
AdditionalInfo: After dealing damage, Reduce user's Dexterity.

Name: High Jump Kick
Description: The user launches itself up and falls down with a brutal kick. It might hurt the user if it doesn't hit the target.
AdditionalInfo: If Accuracy Roll is unsuccessful, deal 5 Dice of Damage to the User.

Name: Jump Kick
Description: The Pokemon jumps and delivers a powerful kick. It might hurt the user if it doesn't hit the target.
AdditionalInfo: If Accuracy Roll is unsuccessful, deal 4 Dice of Damage to the User.

Name: Karate Chop
Description: A basic fighting chop that has been practiced and mastered.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical.

Name: Low Kick
Description: The user kicks the target making it fall, the bigger the foe the harder the fall.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 50 kgs. of weight on the foe. Up to +4 Extra Dice may be added this way.

Name: Low Sweep
Description: The Pokemon strikes the foe's legs, leaving it unable to walk normally or run.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce Foe's Dexterity by 2.

Name: Mach Punch
Description: The user launches a punch so quickly that it's barely seen.
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. Priority 1.

Name: Mat Block
Description: The Pokemon uses a mat or something similar as a shield.
AdditionalInfo: Shield. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool. This Move only works the first Round the User has been out.

Name: Meteor Assault
Description: The Pokemon will make an incredible jump to the sky, then lunge towards the foe at a staggering speed, crashing the ground upon impact. The user is left very tired.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Must Recharge.

Name: No Retreat
Description: No surrender. No retreat. Until victory always.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense and Sp. Defense. The user is now blocked.

Name: Octolock
Description: The user wraps its tentacles to immobilize the foe. Being so close enables the user to find weak spots.
AdditionalInfo: Block. Reduce the foe's Defense and Sp. Defense.

Name: Power-Up Punch
Description: The Pokemon uses this punch to test the surface of an object. The user toughens up to deal better blows.
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. Increase User's Strength.

Name: Quick Guard
Description: The user reacts instinctively and defends itself and its teammates, nullifying the effects of the fastest attacks.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 3. Shield Move. This move will only protect against Damaging Moves with "Priority". Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool. Negate the effects of support moves that target the User and Allies.

Name: Revenge
Description: The Pokemon fights ruthlessly and may retaliate fiercely against a foe that has hurt the user.
AdditionalInfo: If the User has already received damage this round, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Name: Reversal
Description: The user gathers its mettle to block away the pain and focus on hitting harder.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every missing HP the User has. Up to 5 Dice may be added this Way.

Name: Rock Smash
Description: A powerful hit that can crush rocks. Used against a foe it is sure to leave an awful bruise and a crack on its armor.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Defense.

Name: Rolling Kick
Description: The user spins in the air landing an impressive kick that may daze the target.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.

Name: Sacred Sword
Description: The user slashes its target with a mighty blade that no armor can stop.
AdditionalInfo: Ignore any Increases to the foe's Defense.

Name: Secret Sword
Description: An invisible wave cuts through the target, you can feel its sharp edge but you cannot see it.
AdditionalInfo: Apply the foe's Defense instead of its Sp. Defense to resist Damage from this Move

Name: Seismic Toss
Description: The target gets launched up then falls face first into the ground, the stronger the user the higher the foe will be thrown.
AdditionalInfo: Roll Damage Dice according to the User's Rank. 1 Dice at Starter Rank. 2 Dice at Beginner Rank.  3 dice at Amateur Rank.  4 Dice at Ace Rank.  5 Dice at Professional Rank. Ignores Defense.

Name: Sky Uppercut
Description: The user attacks with an uppercut, throwing the foe skyward with lots of force.

Name: Storm Throw
Description: The user impacts a weak spot with a powerful blow.
AdditionalInfo: If the Accuracy Roll is successful this move becomes a Critical Hit.

Name: Submission
Description: The user recklessly struggles with the foe to pin it to the ground.
AdditionalInfo: Recoil.

Name: Superpower
Description: The Pokemon makes use of all its force to deliver a crushing strike to the foe, this demands a lot from the user.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Reduce User's Strength and Defense.

Name: Triple Kick
Description: The user throws three or more kicks, leaving the harder blow for the end.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions. Add 1 Extra Dice to Damage Pool to the last kick performed.

Name: Vacuum Wave
Description: The user pulls the enemy closer using the power of its ki. This traction has a lot of strength and may break anything it pulls.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 1.

Name: Vital Throw
Description: The Pokemon awaits for the perfect moment to strike the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Low Priority 1. Never Fail.

Name: Wake-Up Slap
Description: A powerful slap that makes even the laziest Pokemon be well awake.
AdditionalInfo: If the Foe is sleeping, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool. The foe Wakes up afterwards.

Name: Blast Burn
Description: The Pokemon uses all of its power to deliver an infernal blast to the foe. The user is left exhausted.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Must Recharge.

Name: Blaze Kick
Description: The user throws a mighty kick engulfed in fire that may leave a bad looking burn.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to the Foe.

Name: Blue Flare
Description: Reshiram surrounds itself with a giant blue flame that is unleashed with an earth shattering explosion. Receiving this attack directly might completely engulf you in fire.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 3 to the foe.

Name: Burn Up
Description: The User unleashes all of its might through a massive blast of raging fire. Although the damage is devastating the Pokemon is left unable to produce more fire for at least a day.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. After Damage is dealt, the user is no longer considered a Fire-Type for the rest of the day (if its only type was Fire, it is now considered Typeless). Fire-type Moves won't add their Power to the Damage pool of this Pokemon for the rest of the day.

Name: Ember
Description: The user shoots a small flame against the target that may cause a first-degree burn.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.

Name: Eruption
Description: A fierce burst of lava coming from the user at full force charring whatever comes in contact with it.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Reduce 1 Dice from the Damage Pool for every missing HP the User has. Up to 5 dice may be removed this way.

Name: Fiery Dance
Description: The user cloaks itself in flames and shoots them while dancing gracefully.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Special.

Name: Fire Blast
Description: The Pokemon shoots a giant fireball that explodes on contact with the foe, blasting fire in all directions.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to apply Burn 3 to the foe.

Name: Fire Fang
Description: The user breathes fire from its mouth while biting the target.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance to Flinch the Foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.

Name: Fire Lash
Description: With a whip of fire, the Pokemon ensnares its foe, who is left defenseless and at its mercy.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce Foe's Defense.

Name: Fire Pledge
Description: The Pokemon chants to invoke the power of Fire. Its pledge is heard, then the flames consume everything around.
AdditionalInfo: All flammable plants and objects in the battlefield are covered in flames. Roll 1 Dice of Fire Damage at the end of every Round against everyone on the field.

Name: Fire Punch
Description: The User can ignite its fists for a brief moment without any danger of getting burned. The foe may not be so lucky.
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to apply Burn 2 to the foe.

Name: Fire Spin
Description: The user creates a vortex of fire that remains spinning in the battlefield, trapping the foe within.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Flame Burst
Description: A concentrated flameball that bursts on contact with the foe, scattering smaller flames around.
AdditionalInfo: After dealing damage, the user may roll 1 Dice of Damage against two other Targets.

Name: Flame Charge
Description: The Pokemon uses its flames as propulsion to strike the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Dexterity.

Name: Flame Wheel
Description: The user cloaks itself in flames and rolls to tackle the target.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.

Name: Flamethrower
Description: The user lets out a powerful fire stream that leaves a scorched trail.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to the foe.

Name: Flare Blitz
Description: The user sets itself on fire, recklessly charging against the target with a brutal strike.
AdditionalInfo: Recoil. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 3 to the foe.

Name: Fusion Flare
Description: The Pokemon sets ablaze a swirling pillar upon the target, said pillar will grow taller and swirl faster if there's a special kind of charge nearby.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. If the Move “Fusion Bolt” has already been used by anyone this Round, add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this Move

Name: Heat Crash
Description: The user slams the target with a body engulfed in fire.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 50 kgs. of weight above the target's weight. Up to +4 Extra Dice may be added this way.

Name: Heat Wave
Description: The user breathes a giant wave of incandescent air that might set fire to whatever it touches.
AdditionalInfo: Target all foes in Range. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Burn those affected.

Name: Incinerate
Description: The Pokemon releases a blast of fire that instantly consumes small flammable objects.
AdditionalInfo: Destroy the held Berries of those affected.

Name: Inferno
Description: The Pokemon sets the foe on fire. These flames rise up to 6 feet. A very dangerous Move.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Apply Burn 3 to the Foe.

Name: Lava Plume
Description: The user shoots up bits of molten lava that fall scattered around the field.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Burn those affected.

Name: Magma Storm
Description: The Pokemon shoots a fiery eruption to its foe. Unable to escape and surrounded by the unbearable heat the foe's survival is at risk.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks. Roll 3 Damage Dice at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Mind Blown
Description: The Pokemon has had a terrible day and has a very bad headache, try not to disturb its peace because its head feels like exploding.
AdditionalInfo: Area Attack. Recoil.

Name: Mystical Fire
Description: This mystical fire not only burns the foe, it also drains its power.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce Foe's Special.

Name: Overheat
Description: A furious wave of scorching fire that will turn to ashes everything it touches, exhausting the user afterwards.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Reduce User's Special by 2.

Name: Pyro Ball
Description: The Pokemon lights a heavy stone on fire and kicks it while it's ablaze. The hit is pretty heavy already, the fire is just for showing off.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to the Foe.

Name: Sacred Fire
Description: A blazing pillar of rainbow-colored flames crashes upon the foe, it burns and cleanses the evil from within. Those with a pure heart should not fear for they'll be unharmed.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Roll 5 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 3 to the Foe.

Name: Searing Shot
Description: The User torches everything around itself in a sudden burst of scarlet flames. Everything is brought to cinders in a matter of seconds.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. All Foes in Range. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 those Affected.

Name: Shell Trap
Description: It apparently just buries underground, but secretely the Pokemon prepares its shell to detonate; anyone who steps on it will be blown to pieces.
AdditionalInfo: Low Priority 3. This Move strikes the next time the user is hit with a Non- Physical attack.

Name: Sizzly Slide
Description: The user slides on the floor as if it was ice-skating, only there is no ice, only a raging fire.
AdditionalInfo: If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails. Burn the Foe.

Name: Sunny Day
Description: The Pokemon will raise the temperature along with the sun, it doesn't work at night, indoors, underground, or underwater.
AdditionalInfo: Sunny Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.

Name: V-Create
Description: The user slams its foe with a V-Shaped flame on its forehead. Upon impact, it detonates a terrible explosion and leaves the user pretty vulnerable afterwards.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the user's Dexterity, Defense, and Sp. Defense.

Name: Will-O-Wisp
Description: The user calls a floating ember to consume the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Burn the Foe.

Name: Acrobatics
Description: The user makes quick and graceful acrobatic moves to hit the foe, it will be swifter if nothing gets in the way.
AdditionalInfo: If the User has a Held Item, remove 2 Dice from the Damage Roll.

Name: Aerial Ace
Description: The Pokemon rises up in the air towards a light source, momentarily blinding the foe, then plummets quickly to attack the opponent.
AdditionalInfo: Never Fail.

Name: Aeroblast
Description: The victim is trapped in a violently swirling vortex. The strong wind currents make debris fly everywhere.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. High Critical.

Name: Air Cutter
Description: The user will send out a wave of sharp wind that will harm anything it touches.
AdditionalInfo: Target all foes in Range. High Critical.

Name: Air Slash
Description: The user will surround the foe with razor-like wind that may knock it down.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Beak Blast
Description: The Pokemon gets ready to release a boiling gas through its beak, which gets incredibly hot. The resulting blast sounds like a train's horn.
AdditionalInfo: Charge Move. Low Priority 3. If the User is hit by a Non  Physical Attack while this move is charging, apply Burn 2 to the foe.

Name: Bounce
Description: The Pokemon will jump 30 feet in the air before landing on top of the foe. The user won't suffer any falling damage.
AdditionalInfo: Charge Move. While charging this Move, the user will be out of range. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

Name: Brave Bird
Description: The Pokemon flies straight at the foe at full speed, the collision might hurt both of them.
AdditionalInfo: Recoil.

Name: Chatter
Description: The user starts talking and giving orders in human language. It may be extremely confusing for the foes.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe. Sound based move.

Name: Defog
Description: A strong current of wind that blows away any fog and even invisible barriers.
AdditionalInfo: Remove all Barriers (ie. Light Screen, Reflect), Entry Hazards (Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, etc.), and Terrains (Misty Terrain, Electric Terrain, etc.) from the battlefield.

Name: Dragon Ascent
Description: The user rises above the clouds and then comes crashing down against its foe in an instant. The strike is brutal for both.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Reduce the user's Defense and Sp. Defense.

Name: Drill Peck
Description: The user pierces the foe with its beak used as a drill. A dangerous move.

Name: Feather Dance
Description: A beautiful dance that soothes the hearts of those who watch it, reducing their aggressive intentions.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Strength by 2.

Name: Floaty Fall
Description: With the help of some air balloons, the user jumps up high and falls on top of its foe. The use of balloons in-battle is questionable, but the referee will allow them.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Fly
Description: The user flies up high in one action, then drops and strikes in the next one. The Pokemon can fly for extremely long periods of time without getting tired.
AdditionalInfo: Charge Move. While charging this move the User will be out of range, with the exception of the attacks Hurricane and Thunder.

Name: Gust
Description: The Pokemon flaps its wings to strike the foe with wind.

Name: Hurricane
Description: The user attacks by wrapping the opponent in a fierce wind that carries the target up into the sky.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the Foe. If Rain Weather in effect ignore this moves reduced accuracy.

Name: Mirror Move
Description: The user concentrates and manages to imitate the last move used by the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Copies the last Damaging Move the foe has performed.

Name: Oblivion Wing
Description: A dark wind rises, turning everything it touches into dust to be scattered until nothing remains. People, Pokemon, plants, everything fades until a distant memory.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. High Critical.

Name: Peck
Description: The Pokemon uses its beak or horn to jab the foe, hurting a little bit.

Name: Pluck
Description: The user gives a hard peck and may get something tasty out of the foe.
AdditionalInfo: If the Target is holding a Berry, the User eats it and gains its effects.

Name: Roost
Description: The Pokemon uses its action to land on the ground and relax.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. Until the User's next action this Pokemon will be vulnerable to Ground Type moves.

Name: Sky Attack
Description: The Pokemon darts from the sky with a graceful and lethal strike, propelling with the wind, crushing the foe to the ground.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. High Critical. Charge Move. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Sky Drop
Description: The user carries the opponent to the sky, then drops the target from that altitude.
AdditionalInfo: Charge Move. While charging this move the Target is flinched. Flying Type Pokemon are immune to the Damage of this move. Lifting a target is restricted by the Strength of the User.

Name: Tailwind
Description: User flaps its wings and casts a turbulent wind that helps the team move significantly faster.
AdditionalInfo: For the Next 4 Rounds, Increase the Dexterity of the User and All Allies in the field by 2.

Name: Wing Attack
Description: The user flies towards the foe and strikes with its wings.

Name: Astonish
Description: The user sneaks close and startles the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Confuse Ray
Description: The user flashes a sinister ray of bright light that leaves the target disoriented and confused.
AdditionalInfo: Confuse the foe.

Name: Curse
Description: The user mutters words that become an evil incantation, the curse may only be lifted by a medium or through divine intervention.
AdditionalInfo: Roll half the user's HP as damage dice to itself, ignoring Defenses. The target will remove 1 success from all their rolls until the Curse is lifted.

Name: Curse (Non-Ghost User)
Description: The Pokemon prepares to deal and receive damage by muttering something not appropriate for kids.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength and Defense. Reduce the User's Dexterity. This effect is only for Pokemon who are not Ghost-Type.

Name: Destiny Bond
Description: The Pokemon creates a mystical bond with anyone that causes it harm. Whatever ill falls on the user, it falls on the perpetrator too.
AdditionalInfo: If the user faints this Round due to Combat damage, the Pokemon that dealt the damage will faint at the same time.

Name: Grudge
Description: The user leaves an imprinting grudge over the foe, this makes the target unwilling to fight. It may only keep battling if something greater is at risk.
AdditionalInfo: The User Faints. The foe gets its Will depleted and any effects gained from spending them. The Foe must roll Loyalty at the end of every Round to keep battling. Each Round 1 more success is required.

Name: Hex
Description: The user casts a terrible hex over the target, the effects will be greater if the target is vulnerable.
AdditionalInfo: If the Target is affected by a Status Ailment add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Name: Lick
Description: The user licks the foe. The saliva can numb the body of most creatures.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Foe.

Name: Moongeist Beam
Description: A cold reflection of the moon shines upon the target, it doesn't hurt physically but those who stare directly into the light simply collapse.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. If anything on the foe's side would prevent this move from dealing damage (Pokemon Type, Abilities, Shield Moves, Weather or Barriers) ignore it. This Move cannot be Clashed.

Name: Night Shade
Description: The user casts a shade with a frightening mirage inside that torments the target.
AdditionalInfo: Roll Damage Dice according to the User's Rank. 1 Dice at Starter Rank. 2 Dice at Beginner Rank.  3 dice at Amateur Rank.  4 Dice at Ace Rank.  5 Dice at Professional Rank. Ignores Defense.

Name: Nightmare
Description: The user enters the target's dream to torment it.
AdditionalInfo: Will only work if the Target is asleep. Deal 1 Damage to the foe. Deal 1 Damage again at the beginning of each Round if the target is still asleep.

Name: Ominous Wind
Description: The Pokemon sends out a goosebump-inducing, repulsive wind that might make the user feel an evil rush.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense, and Sp. Defense.

Name: Phantom Force
Description: The Pokemon disappears into a dark dimension to infiltrate even the most impenetrable defenses. It may reappear during its next action.
AdditionalInfo: Charge Move. While charging this Move, other Moves will not affect the user. If the Target made a Shielding Action the shield is destroyed and won't have any effect.

Name: Shadow Ball
Description: The Pokemon hurls a sphere made of shadow and dark matter to harm the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense.

Name: Shadow Bone
Description: The bone that this Pokemon uses as a weapon contains a spirit, that spirit may cling onto a victim, creating openings for its master.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Defense.

Name: Shadow Claw
Description: Claws become semi-ethereal and are able to briefly pierce armor, hide, skin, and objects so it can strike the target on any weak spot.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical.

Name: Shadow Force
Description: The Pokemon disappears into a dark dimension to strike its foe at the next opportunity. The blow will hurt the target not on their body but directly on their soul.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Charge Move. While charging this Move, other Move will not affect the user. If the Target made a Shielding Action, the shield is destroyed and won't have any effect. Damage dealt by this Move cannot be healed for 24 hrs

Name: Shadow Punch
Description: The Pokemon punches through its own shadow. The attack comes out from the foe's shadows as if it were a portal.
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. Never Fail.

Name: Shadow Sneak
Description: The user sneaks through darkness and strikes out of the target's shadow. The Pokemon can move freely inside shades as if it were incorporeal.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 1.

Name: Spectral Thief
Description: Through the shadows, the user sneaks on its target to steal its life force and consume it, leaving the victim with a sense of grief and loss.
AdditionalInfo: If successful, BEFORE the user deals damage with this Move, steal all Attribute Increases the foe may have. Reduced Attributes on the foe remain.

Name: Spirit Shackle
Description: While attacking, the user sneakily binds its foe's shadow to the ground, restricting its movement and making it unable to escape.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks.

Name: Spite
Description: The target feels overwhelmed by feelings of dread.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce Target's Will to 1 point temporarily. Reset any effects it got from spending Will Points.

Name: Trick-Or-Treat
Description: The Pokemon takes the target Trick-or-Treating. The target gets a ghost costume which somehow cannot be removed without a medium's help.
AdditionalInfo: Add the Ghost type to Target's Type. (ie. Meowth will now by Normal/Ghost Charizard will now be Fire/Flying/Ghost) If the Pokemon already has a third type attached, replace it.

Name: Absorb
Description: The user absorbs the vital energy of the foe.
AdditionalInfo: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt rounded down.

Name: Apple Acid
Description: The Pokemon produces a sap from the tart apples it feeds on, if the apples, this sap is acidic and bad for your teeth.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the Foe's Sp. Defense.

Name: Aromatherapy
Description: The Pokemon releases medicinal scents and vapors to refresh the user and its allies.
AdditionalInfo: Cure User and Allies from Burn, Freeze, Paralysis, Poison, or Sleep.

Name: Branch Poke
Description: The Pokemon rudely starts poking its foe with a stick.

Name: Bullet Seed
Description: The Pokemon shoots seeds rapidly as if they were bullets.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Cotton Guard
Description: The user covers itself in cotton puffs that severely reduce the impact of physical attacks.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Defense by 3.

Name: Cotton Spore
Description: The Pokemon covers the foe in cotton, disrupting its movement speed.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce foe's Dexterity by 2.

Name: Drum Beating
Description: The Pokemon has a perfectly good drum and you'd think it would use it. But it doesn't. It uses it's foe.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the Foe's Dexterity

Name: Energy Ball
Description: The Pokemon gathers nature's energy in a ball and hurls it at the foe. Trees and bushes may be left opaque and sad.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Sp. Defense.

Name: Forest's Curse
Description: The user calls the forest to lay a curse upon the target, making it grow vines and vegetation around its whole body. The curse will not be easily lifted without a medium's help.
AdditionalInfo: Add the Grass Type to the Target's Type (ie. Nidoran will now be Poison/Grass Heracross will now be Bug/Fight/Grass). If the Pokemon already has a third type attached then replace it.

Name: Frenzy Plant
Description: The user roots down and calls the plants to grow in a frenzy around the foe, though it leaves the user exhausted.
AdditionalInfo: Must Recharge.

Name: Giga Drain
Description: The Pokemon extracts a great amount of vital energy from the foe's body.
AdditionalInfo: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.

Name: Grass Knot
Description: The user snares the target's feet with grass, making it fall to the ground. The bigger the foe the harder the fall.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 50 kgs. of weight on the foe, up to +4 Extra Dice.

Name: Grass Pledge
Description: The Pokemon chants to invoke the power of Grass. Its pledge is heard then then soil trembles and the ground crumbles as vegetation rises to grapple anyone in the field.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.

Name: Grass Whistle
Description: The user plays a beautiful and soothing melody that lulls the target into a peaceful sleep.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based. Put the Target to Sleep.

Name: Grassy Terrain
Description: The Pokemon calls upon the healing power of nature to grow a patch of miraculous grass on its side of the battlefield.
AdditionalInfo: If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. Everyone in the user's side of the field heals 1 HP at the end of each round. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Rolls of Grass Type Moves.

Name: Grav Apple
Description: The Pokemon rises on top of its foe and drops an apple on their head. The foe proceeds to eat the apple, distracting it from the fight.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the Foe's Defense.

Name: Horn Leech
Description: The user rams the foe and absorbs some of its vital energy with its horns.
AdditionalInfo: The User restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.

Name: Ingrain
Description: The Pokemon roots itself to the ground, absorbing the nutrients and recovering health.
AdditionalInfo: User Heals 1 HP at the end of every Round. While this move is active the User is now Blocked.

Name: Leaf Blade
Description: The Pokemon uses the sharp leaves on its body to cut through the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. High Critical.

Name: Leaf Storm
Description: A furious storm of sharp leaves swirls and pierces the target. The user is left exhausted.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the User's Special by 2.

Name: Leaf Tornado
Description: A bush worth of sharp leaves swirls around the foe making it harder for it to aim attacks properly.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Accuracy.

Name: Leafage
Description: The user throws leaf darts towards its foe.

Name: Leech Seed
Description: The user plants some seeds on the target, the seeds sprout and restore the user's health by absorbing the foe's vital energy.
AdditionalInfo: If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. At the end of each Round, Roll 1 Dice of Damage to the foe. User heals for 1 HP for every damage dealt this way. Grass Type Pokemon are immune to this Move.

Name: Magical Leaf
Description: The user sends out a floating leaf that will pursue the target until it hits.
AdditionalInfo: Never Fail.

Name: Mega Drain
Description: The user absorbs a big amount of vital energy from the target.
AdditionalInfo: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down.

Name: Needle Arm
Description: The Pokemon hits the foe with its flailing arms, some thorns may get stuck on the target like needles.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.

Name: Petal Blizzard
Description: The Pokemon showers the battlefield with a raging blizzard of petals and leaves, anyone close to the user will suffer the consequences.

Name: Petal Dance
Description: The Pokemon starts swirling petals around in a true display of nature's power, the petals are guided by the wind to strike the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Rampage.

Name: Power Whip
Description: The Pokemon violently lashes the foe with its vines or a part of its body, acting as a powerful whip.

Name: Razor Leaf
Description: The Pokemon shoots one or more sharp leaves that cut through all targets as if they were razors.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical.

Name: Sappy Seed
Description: From a magical bean, the user grows a cute stalk that will attach itself to the nearest target. Once it ingrains, it will grow and grow and grow until it reaches the sky.
AdditionalInfo: At the end of the Round, Roll 1 Die of Damage to the foe. Restore 1 HP to the user for every damage dealt this way. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Seed Bomb
Description: The user throws a big seed that explodes on contact with the foe.

Name: Seed Flare
Description: Shaymin releases an explosion of pollen and seeds that the foe cannot shake off, leaving it vulnerable. Over time, these seeds will grow into gigantic trees of life.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Roll 4 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense by 2.

Name: Sleep Powder
Description: The user scatters powder around, anyone who comes in contact with it will fall asleep.
AdditionalInfo: Put the Target to Sleep.

Name: Snap Trap
Description: The user is so flat that you can barely see it in the tall grass, it is just waiting for its foe to get close enough to use its body as a snare trap.
AdditionalInfo: Target is Blocked for the Next 4 Rounds.

Name: Solar Beam
Description: The user focuses the sunlight it has absorbed into a powerful and devastating beam of light.
AdditionalInfo: Charge Move. If there is a Sunny Weather, you skip this Move's Charge action. If performed under Rain, Sandstorm, or Hail Weather, this Move takes two actions to Charge.

Name: Solar Blade
Description: The Pokemon focuses the sunlight on its sharp leaves, then releases the energy with a shattering block.
AdditionalInfo: Charge Move. If there is a Sunny Weather, you skip this Move's Charge action. If performed under Rain, Sandstorm, or Hail Weather, this Move takes two actions to Charge.

Name: Spiky Shield
Description: The Pokemon covers itself with a thorn filled shell, the foe will be damaged if it hits directly into it.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 3. Shield. Reduce 3 Damage from the next attack and deal 2 Damage Dice to the attacker if it used a physical non-ranged Move.

Name: Spore
Description: A powerful somniferous spore that is shot at the target to make it fall asleep.
AdditionalInfo: Put the Target to Sleep.

Name: Strength Sap
Description: The Pokemon looks for a weak spot on its foe, then feeds on its vital energy. The foe is left feeling feeble.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce Foe's Strength. User Heals HP equal to the Foe's Current Strength Score. Healing in-battle limitations apply.

Name: Stun Spore
Description: A blow of dust that paralyzes the target on the spot and cramps its muscles.
AdditionalInfo: Paralyze the Foe.

Name: Synthesis
Description: The Pokemon uses the sunlight as energy to regain its vitality.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. If Successful spend 1 Will point to activate. If performed under Sunny weather this Move is a Complete Heal. If Rain/Sandstorm Weather is in effect this move only heals 1 HP.

Name: Trop Kick
Description: The user strikes with an intense and alluring kick.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce Foe's Strength.

Name: Vine Whip
Description: They Pokemon uses its slender vines as a whip against the foe. They are as long as 20 feet.

Name: Wood Hammer
Description: The Pokemon recklessly slams the foe with a part of its rugged body, the user also gets hurt in the process.
AdditionalInfo: Recoil.

Name: Worry Seed
Description: The user plants a seed in its foe. It causes a restless preoccupation that won't let it sleep at night.
AdditionalInfo: Until the end of the Scene. Target's Ability is now "Insomnia".

Name: Bone Club
Description: The user hits the target with a bone, the smack may leave a bump on the target's head.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.

Name: Bone Rush
Description: The user quickly strikes the foe with a bone, one blow after another.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Bonemerang
Description: The Pokemon throws a bone to hit the foe. The bone returns like a boomerang, striking a second time.
AdditionalInfo: Double Action.

Name: Bulldoze
Description: The user stomps and tramples the place, breaking stones, trees, and everything nearby.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.

Name: Dig
Description: The user digs a tunnel on the ground and attacks while coming out from below.
AdditionalInfo: Charge Move. While charging this move, the User will be out of range. Can be hit by Earthquake, Magnitude, or a similar move.

Name: Drill Run
Description: The user rotates its body imitating a drill and crashes against the foe. This attack may pierce through walls and floors with ease and great precision.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical.

Name: Earth Power
Description: The user sends out a subterranean wave that bursts on the ground bellow the target. It looks like the earth molds to the Pokemon's will.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense.

Name: Earthquake
Description: The Pokemon focuses its energy into shaking the ground, everyone around will be thrown like a rag doll.
AdditionalInfo: Area Attack.

Name: Fissure
Description: The user tears the ground apart in a monstrous display of force. If the foe falls through the fissure it might need a rescue team to get it out.
AdditionalInfo: Deal damage to the Target equal to their remaining HP plus 1 lethal damage.

Name: High Horsepower
Description: The Pokemon rushes towards its target and tramples it without mercy.

Name: Land's Wrath
Description: The earth moves on its own, no attacker in sight. The floor crumbles and the ground shakes while engulfing its victims. From the rubble, lush trees emerge a short time after.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal.  All Foes in Range.

Name: Magnitude
Description: The user quakes the ground plates. Some plates will move easier than others.
AdditionalInfo: 1 Dice to determine this Move's Power

Name: Mud Bomb
Description: The Pokemon shoots a ball made of mud that bursts on the target, some mud may get on its eyes.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Accuracy.

Name: Mud Shot
Description: The Pokemon shoots a stream of mud that covers the foe, obstructing its movement.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the Foe's Dexterity.

Name: Mud Slap
Description: The user hurls some mud to the face of the foe, leaving it unable to see clearly.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Accuracy.

Name: Mud Sport
Description: The user covers everything with mud, reducing the effectiveness of electric attacks made on the field.
AdditionalInfo: For the next 4 Rounds Electric Type attacks won't add their Power to the Damage Pool.

Name: Precipice Blades
Description: Giant blades emerge from the earth with every step of the user. If you fall into them, they are almost impossible to survive.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal.

Name: Rototiller
Description: The Pokemon digs around and moves the soil to make it ideal for plant growth.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the Strength and Special of all Grass Type Pokemon in the battlefield.

Name: Sand Attack
Description: The user shoots some sand into the opponent's eyes.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Accuracy.

Name: Sand Tomb
Description: The Pokemon creates a shifting sand pit around the foe, leaving it unable to escape.
AdditionalInfo: Block. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of every Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Shore Up
Description: The Pokemon gathers the sand around itself to restore its body to shape.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. If performed under Sandstorm weather, this move is a Complete Heal.

Name: Spikes
Description: The Pokemon shoots pointy pebbles or thorns around the field that deal damage to anyone coming from that side.
AdditionalInfo: Foe Pokemon that enter the battlefield will lose 1 HP, this effect does not stack. Pokemon with the Levitate ability and Flying Type Pokemon are immune to this effect. Entry Hazard.

Name: Stomping Tantrum
Description: The Pokemon throws a tantrum all over the place, it becomes worse if something has frustrated it earlier.
AdditionalInfo: Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this move is the User failed the Accuracy Roll of the last Move it performed.

Name: Thousand Arrows
Description: Out of nowhere, pointy shards come raining from the sky towards the foes, even flying creatures will fall to the ground if they are knocked by them. Take cover, this is gonna hurt.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal.  All Foes in Range. If successful, Flying and Levitating Pokemon can be hit by Ground-Type Moves for the rest of the scene.

Name: Thousand Waves
Description: Solid ground becomes a sandtrap, cracked earth will close to ensnare your feet. It's as it the land itself wanted to trap you. There is no attacker nor escape in sight.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks.  All Foes in Range.

Name: Aurora Beam
Description: The Pokemon shoots a beautiful rainbow colored beam that may leave the foe flabbergasted.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce foe's Strength.

Name: Aurora Veil
Description: Aurora lights and hail spin around the Pokemon and its Allies, deflecting attacks.
AdditionalInfo: User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from both Physical and Special Attacks. This move will fail if not performed under Hail Weather. Lasts until Hail Weather is over.

Name: Avalanche
Description: The user builds up a lot of snow around itself. If anything disturbs the snow, it will fall on the attacker like an avalanche.
AdditionalInfo: Low Priority 4. If the user received damage from the target this Round, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Name: Blizzard
Description: The user swirls a violent gelid wind around the foes. This blizzard may not last long, but it is tremendously strong.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze those affected. If performed under Hail Weather Ignore this moves Reduced Accuracy and the Move can't be evaded. If performed under Sunny Weather Accuracy becomes -3 instead.

Name: Freeze Dry
Description: The user freezes all moisture in the environment, water type Pokemon suffer greatly.
AdditionalInfo: Water type Pokemon are dealt 2 Extra Damage.

Name: Freeze Shock
Description: The user appears to become a block of ice, then it releases itself from the ice with a devastating discharge. The exploding ice shards and the lightning fly all over the battlefield.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal.  Charge Move. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the Foe.

Name: Freezy Frost
Description: The user touches its foe while playing "Freeze!". Surprisingly, the foe becomes frozen on a block of ice. Once they realize they were just playing pretend the ice dissolves into haze.
AdditionalInfo: If successful, remove all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits the Foe may have. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Frost Breath
Description: The user shoots a gelid breath against the target that sends a chill through the spine. The sudden change of temperature can bring anyone to its knees.
AdditionalInfo: This Move is always a Critical Hit and it gets the proper bonus for it.

Name: Glaciate
Description: The air is so cold it hurts to move, to see, to breath. Escaping should be your top priority, for every second you don't your life will be at peril.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. All Foes in Range. Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.

Name: Hail
Description: The user summons a hailstorm that will stay on the battlefield for some time.
AdditionalInfo: Hail Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.

Name: Haze
Description: The user sends out a haze that disturbs all the Pokemon engaged in battle. It may conceal whoever is inside.
AdditionalInfo: Remove all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits on everyone on the Battlefield.

Name: Ice Ball
Description: The user curls into a snowball, rolling against the foe. The ball grows bigger as it rolls.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of the last Ice Ball hit the user performes. If the Pokemon used Defense Curl this Round, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of every hit.

Name: Ice Beam
Description: The user shoots a freezing ray that greatly lowers the temperature of anything it hits.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze the Foe.

Name: Ice Burn
Description: The user appears to become a block of ice, then it releases itself from the ice with a devastating explosion. The exploding ice shards and fire blow all over the battlefield.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal.  Charge Move. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Burn the Foe.

Name: Ice Fang
Description: The user bites the foe and releases a gelid breath through its mouth.
