AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Freeze the foe.

Name: Ice Hammer
Description: The Pokemon uses its powerful gelid arms and strikes the foe with a swinging motion.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce User's Dexterity.

Name: Ice Punch
Description: The Pokemon delivers a strike covered in ice. The user's hands can freeze anything they touch.
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze the foe.

Name: Ice Shard
Description: The user quickly freezes some bits of ice and throws them at the target.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 1.

Name: Icicle Crash
Description: The user drops a big icicle over the foe, the impact may leave the opponent dazed.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.

Name: Icicle Spear
Description: The user launches a wave of small but pointy icicles towards the target.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Icy Wind
Description: A breeze so cold that it chills you to the bone, making it harder to move.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce Dexterity of those affected.

Name: Mist
Description: The user cloaks itself and its allies within cold mist with mystic properties, it may conceal whoever is nearby.
AdditionalInfo: For the next 4 Rounds, the User and Allies cannot have their Attributes or Traits reduced.

Name: Powder Snow
Description: The user sends out a wind current full of snowflakes that freeze whatever they touch. This powder can easily turn a room to ice.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze those affected.

Name: Sheer Cold
Description: The user freezes the foe from the inside out. Victims of this attack will need urgent medical attention.
AdditionalInfo: Deal damage to the Target equal to its remaining HP plus 1 Lethal Damage.

Name: Acupressure
Description: The user starts pushing its pressure points, releasing the energy that was stored in its body.
AdditionalInfo: Increase a Random Attribute. If this Move is used again, the previous Attribute Modifier is removed.

Name: After You
Description: The user bows and courteously lets an ally or foe use their action first.
AdditionalInfo: The Target will go first in the order of Initiative. Lasts for the rest of this Battle.

Name: Assist
Description: The Pokemon hurriedly remembers one action performed by a partner. Some Pokemon can even do what a human does and assist him with any tasks.
AdditionalInfo: Choose one Move known by a random member of your party. You performed that Move using the Accuracy roll from Assist.

Name: Attract
Description: The user makes use of its good looks and attitude to infatuate its foe.
AdditionalInfo: If Successful, Target is now In Love. This Move fails if target is from same gender as the User or genderless.

Name: Barrage
Description: The Pokemon Throws many round objects at the target, one after the other.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Baton Pass
Description: The user stores part of its power on a twig or a stick, anyone who touch the item will receive its might.
AdditionalInfo: Switcher Move. User switches out with another Pokemon. Any Attribute increase on the user is passed on the next Pokemon. The user can’t increase its Attributes again until the end of the scene.

Name: Belly Drum
Description: The Pokemon Roars a war cry while hitting its Belly.
AdditionalInfo: User deals Damage to itself equal to Half of its total HP rounded down. Increase User's Strength by 3.

Name: Bestow
Description: The Pokemon respectfully offers an item, the target will take it and keep it to be polite.
AdditionalInfo: If target is not holding an Item, the User gives its own.

Name: Bide
Description: The user endures the hit then unleashes an attack even greater.
AdditionalInfo: The User will take the next 2 hits. After those two attacks, you may use this Move again to retaliate with Strength + Twice the Damage Received from those 2 hits.

Name: Bind
Description: The Pokemon uses its body to bind the foe, restraining and squeezing it.
AdditionalInfo: Block. Deal 2 dice of damage at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Block
Description: The user moves swiftly, blocking the escape routes of the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks.

Name: Body Slam
Description: The user charges against the foe using its body to knock it down, leaving the target stunned.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe.

Name: Boomburst
Description: The user creates an explosive sound that deafens everyone in the battlefield.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based.

Name: Camouflage
Description: The user mimics the environment, it becomes one with the surroundings.
AdditionalInfo: For the rest of the scene the User changes type to one that fits the terrain it is in (i.e. Usar is in a rocky cave, becoming rock type)

Name: Captivate
Description: The Pokemon shows off its attractiveness and even flirts with the opponents, those who fall for its charms can’t focus on the battle.
AdditionalInfo: If the affected targets are from the opposite gender, Reduce their Special by 2.

Name: Chip Away
Description: The user looks for an opening and strikes directly there. It nibbles bit by bit even the toughest of surfaces.
AdditionalInfo: This attack ignores Defense and Evasion modifiers on the foe.

Name: Comet Punch
Description: The user throws a quick series of punches at the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions. Fist Based.

Name: Confide
Description: The Pokemon tells a secret to the target. The foe loses its ability to concentrate.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foes' Special.

Name: Constrict
Description: The Pokemon uses its body to hold and constrict the foe. It won't let go easily.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Conversion
Description: The Pokemon downloads the data of a Move to add it to its code.
AdditionalInfo: The user changes its type at random.

Name: Conversion 2
Description: The Pokemon downloads the data of a move that was used against it. Change the code of the user to a type resistant to the that move.
AdditionalInfo: After being dealt damage, choose a Type resistant to the Type of that attack. That's the Type of the User until it uses this Move again.

Name: Copycat
Description: The user will closely watch the movements of the target and will imitate them to perfection.
AdditionalInfo: Copies the last move the foe has performed.

Name: Court Change
Description: The Pokemon signals the referee for half-time, the referee complies and both parties swap their sides of the field. Wait. Did we forget something?
AdditionalInfo: Swap any Barriers (i.e.Light Screen, Reflect etc.), Entry Hazards (i.e. Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web etc.) and Effects on the foe's side of the field (i.e. Tailwind, Grassy Terrain etc.) for the one's on the User's side.

Name: Covet
Description: The User approaches with caution, deals a quick strike and takes the chance to steal the target's item.
AdditionalInfo: If the user is not holding an item, Steal the target's Held Item.

Name: Crush Claw
Description: The user crushes its claws against the foe, it may pierce the skin of the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the target's Defense by 2. Lethal.

Name: Crush Grip
Description: The Pokemon grips the foe and starts crushing it. Small targets are difficult to grasp but larger bodies will not be released until they break.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. If the foe has a Base HP higher than 3, add 1 Die to the Damage pool for every exceeding point. Up to 9 Dice may be added this way

Name: Cut
Description: A slim but precise cut that may slice through anything.
AdditionalInfo: May be used to cut down trees and clear paths.

Name: Defense Curl
Description: The user curls like a ball to protect against most threats.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Defense.

Name: Disable
Description: The user hits a nerve on the foe, impeding it from performing its previous action for a short while.
AdditionalInfo: The Target cannot use the last move it performed. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Dizzy Punch
Description: A swift punch to the jaw that spins the target and may leave it quite dizzy and disoriented.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe. Fist Based.

Name: Double Hit
Description: The Pokemon uses the classic 'One-Two' to attack the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Double Action.

Name: Double Slap
Description: The user attacks its foe with two or more slaps in the face.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Double Team
Description: The user moves rapidly around the foe, creating illusory copies of itself.
AdditionalInfo: The User can now make up to 5 Evasions per Round.

Name: Double-Edge
Description: The user recklessly slams its foe to deal a lot of damage, but it may also hurt itself in the process.
AdditionalInfo: Recoil.

Name: Echoed Voice
Description: The user shouts loudly and the echo answers back, it will yell louder every time the echo talks back.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based. This move can be used many times in the same Round. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every consecutive time you use it. Up to 8 dice may be added this way. Reset the effect if the user performs another move, evasion, or clash.

Name: Egg Bomb
Description: The user throws a big egg with great force against its foe.

Name: Encore
Description: The user claps and cheers at the target to encourage it to repeat what it just did.
AdditionalInfo: For the duration of this effect, the target will repeat the exact same action sequence it had this round. Target must have had an action sequence. Last 4 Rounds. Priority 3.

Name: Endeavor
Description: With pure willpower, the user struggles with its foe despite the pain
AdditionalInfo: Roll Damage equal to the Difference between user's Full HP and its Current HP (up to 10). User cannot reduce the target's HP to lower than its own remaining HP. Ignore foe's Defenses.

Name: Endure
Description: The user gets prepared to receive a fatal blow. It resists the pain despite being seriously hurt.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 5. Shield Move. For the rest of the Round damaging moves can not reduce the user's HP to less then 1. Status Ailments, Weather Conditions, Recoil, Self inflicted damage can still deal damage.

Name: Entrainment
Description: The Pokemon dances with a catchy rhythm. The target starts dancing too and both connect to a very personal level through this performance.
AdditionalInfo: The target's Ability is replaced by the User's own Ability. (ie. Luvdiscs's Swift Swim Ability will replace Geodude's Sturdy Ability).

Name: Explosion
Description: The user focuses on exploding its body, the explosion deals a massive wave of damage. A very dangerous move.
AdditionalInfo: After the damage is dealt the User faints. Lethal.

Name: Extreme Speed
Description: The user charges at a blinding speed against the target.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 2. Triple the Pokemon's movement speed.

Name: Facade
Description: The Pokemon will make an upfront attack. If the user is suffering, the attack will be stronger.
AdditionalInfo: If User's got a Status Ailment (Paralysis, Poison, Burn, etc.) Add 3 Extra Dice to the Damage pool.

Name: Fake Out
Description: While still preparing for battle, the user will suddenly attack the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 1. Flinch the foe. This move will only work the First Round the Pokemon is out in battle. From the second round on, it will fail automatically.

Name: False Swipe
Description: The user strikes the foe but lowers the power of the blow at the last second.
AdditionalInfo: The foe can't go below 1 HP when hit by this Move.

Name: Feint
Description: The Pokemon feints a strike then hits for real even if the foe attempts to protect itself.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 2. This Move ignores any Shielding Move.

Name: Flail
Description: The User flails and struggles to survive. The more weakened it is the stronger this attack will be.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll for every missing HP the user has. Up to +5 Dice may be added this way.

Name: Flash
Description: The user suddenly emits a blinding light around its body, dazing its opponent in the process.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce 1 success from all the foe's Accuracy rolls.

Name: Focus Energy
Description: The Pokemon's energy is raised to make all strikes much more precise.
AdditionalInfo: All of the user's damage moves now have High Critical. This effect lasts until end of scene or the user is removed from battle.

Name: Follow Me
Description: The Pokemon will draw everyone's attention. All foes are taunted to do their worst.
AdditionalInfo: Foes will target the user this Round. Priority 5.

Name: Foresight
Description: The Pokemon uses its developed senses and mental ability to foresee the immediate future.
AdditionalInfo: The Foe cannot evade moves performed by the user. User's Normal and Fighting Moves can affect Ghost Types and Ghost Moves can affect Normal Types.

Name: Frustration
Description: A move that relies on how badly a Pokemon has been treated to make it vicious and uncaring.
AdditionalInfo: Add +1 Dice to the Damage Roll for every missing point of Happiness on the User.

Name: Fury Attack
Description: The Pokemon goes at it with everything its got in a rather disordered way.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Fury Swipes
Description: The user swiftly uses its claws to strike the foe multiple times.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Giga Impact
Description: The Pokemon strikes with a brutal force using all its body. The impact leaves the user somewhat stunned.
AdditionalInfo: Must Recharge. Lethal.

Name: Glare
Description: The Pokemon uses its intimidating glare to paralyze the foe with sheer terror.
AdditionalInfo: Paralyze the foe.

Name: Growl
Description: Either by a menacing attitude or cute demeanor, the foe will be unsure about attacking the user with full force.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Strength. Sound Based. "Growl (Cute/Tough)", the user should use the one with highest stat (tough / cute)

Name: Growl (Cute)
Description: The user shows its cute demeanor, making the foe unsure about attacking the user with full force.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Strength. Sound Based. Same move as "Growl (Tough)", the user should use the one with highest stat (tough / cute)

Name: Growl (Tough)
Description: The user exhibits a menacing attitude, making the foe unsure about attacking the user with full force.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Strength. Sound Based. Same move as "Growl (Cute)", the user should use the one with highest stat (tough / cute)

Name: Growth
Description: The Pokemon expands its body. It grows bigger and stronger.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength and Special.

Name: Guillotine
Description: The Pokemon uses the sharpest part of its body to almost snap the neck of its foe. It is a devastating attack. The foe must be lucky to get out of it alive.
AdditionalInfo: The target is dealt damage equal to its remaining HP plus 1 Lethal.

Name: Harden
Description: The user stiffins its body and prepares for any incoming attack.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Defense.

Name: Head Charge
Description: The Pokemon clashes against the foe using its head aas a boulder.
AdditionalInfo: Recoil.

Name: Headbutt
Description: The user strikes the foe with its hard head. Perfect for taking down fruits from trees or shake Pokemon out of their nests on treetops.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch. May call Random Encounters when hitting trees.

Name: Heal Bell
Description: The Pokemon chimes a magical bell. Legend says the soothing sound has healing properties.
AdditionalInfo: Cure the User and allies suffering from Status Conditions. They don't need to be on the battlefield to get this effect. Sound Based.

Name: Helping Hand
Description: The Pokemon assists an ally. Together they are stronger.
AdditionalInfo: Target Pokemon gets 2 Extra Dice on its next Skill, Accuracy and Damage Rolls. Priority 5.

Name: Hidden Power
Description: Every Pokemon has an unknown power that can be released with surprising results.
AdditionalInfo: Storyteller decides power and type

Name: Horn Attack
Description: The Pokemon attacks the foe with its horns. This strike is very painful.

Name: Horn Drill
Description: The user stabs the target with a horn used like a drill. The foe is often left in a critical condition. A move to be wary of.
AdditionalInfo: The target is dealt damage equal to its remaining HP plus 1 Lethal.

Name: Howl
Description: The Pokemon lets out an impressive howl, making it appear a lot more menacing.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength.

Name: Hyper Beam
Description: The Pokemon casts an incredible beam that leaves a giant trail of destruction behind. The user is left exhausted.
AdditionalInfo: Must Recharge. Lethal.

Name: Hyper Fang
Description: The Pokemon bites hard into the foe with its powerful fangs.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Flinch.

Name: Hyper Voice
Description: The user emits a horrible echoing sound that could burst the ears.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based.

Name: Judgment
Description: Eventually, everyone gets what they deserve.
AdditionalInfo: Ignore Defenses. This Move is considered to be any Type the user wants. If something would prevent this Move from dealing Damage, ignore it. This Move can't be Clashed. This Move's Power and extra Added Effects are decided by the Storyteller.

Name: Laser Focus
Description: Through its incredible awareness the Pokemon finds a straight path into a weak point of the foe. The attack that follows is usually devastating.
AdditionalInfo: The next time the user lands a hit it will be treated as if it were a Critical Hit.

Name: Last Resort
Description: When everything else fails, the Pokemon gives everything in a last resort attack.
AdditionalInfo: It can be used only after the Pokemon has performed all its known moves at least once during the battle.

Name: Leer
Description: A vicious glare that will make any opponent doubt its own strength in battle.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the Defense of those affected.

Name: Lock-On
Description: The Pokemon's eyes zoom at a moving target to ensure that the next attack will be dealt with precision.
AdditionalInfo: The next attack the user performs has 2 automatic unremovable successes on its Accuracy Roll.

Name: Lovely Kiss
Description: The Pokemon approaches the foe with a kiss. Its ugly face and awful smooch make the poor creature faint in terror.
AdditionalInfo: Put the Target to Sleep.

Name: Lucky Chant
Description: The user chants an incantation to the skies. The beautiful performance grants this Pokemon and its allies divine protection.
AdditionalInfo: User and Allies in range can re-roll one un-successful die from all their rolls until the end of the scene. If an opponent would land a Critical Hit it doesn't. Outside of battle good things happen at the story tellers discretion.

Name: Me First
Description: The user anticipates the next attack so it can hit the target with an astounding speed.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 1. The User copies and uses the Move the target was intending to use. It must be a damaging Move.

Name: Mean Look
Description: The Pokemon gives a menacing look that freezes the foe on the spot with intense fear.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks.

Name: Mega Kick
Description: The Pokemon throws a mega powered kick to the foe's face.

Name: Mega Punch
Description: The Pokemon throws a mega potent hook towards the foe's face.

Name: Metronome
Description: The Pokemon waves its hands with rhythm. The energy around follows the cadence and manifests with an impressive attack.
AdditionalInfo: Roll a dice to determine this move's power. The appearance and Type of this move are decided by the Storyteller.

Name: Milk Drink
Description: The Pokemon drinks a glass of its own milk. The rich taste and nutrients revitalize it.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate.

Name: Mimic
Description: Making use of its acting talents, the Pokemon imitates what the target just did.
AdditionalInfo: Copies the last move the target used until the end of the scene. That move replaces Mimic.

Name: Mind Reader
Description: The user reads the foe's mind. It knows exactly what to do next.
AdditionalInfo: This Pokemon gets 2 automatic successes on the next Accuracy Roll or Evasion Roll against the target.

Name: Minimize
Description: The Pokemon compacts its body, appearing smaller than its normal size.
AdditionalInfo: The User can now make up to 5 Evasions per Round.

Name: Morning Sun
Description: The sun shines brightly on the Pokemon and makes it feel rejuvenated like early in the morning.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. Complete Heal during Sunny Weather. If Rain/Sandstorm Weather is in effect or it's night or you are indoors/underground this move only heals 1 HP.

Name: Multi-Attack
Description: A weird-looking Pokemon charged against its foes, the same attack releases different kinds of energy depending on the disk it was holding.
AdditionalInfo: This Move's type will always match the User's first Type.

Name: Natural Gift
Description: The user throws its berry at the foe. The results can be quite surprising.
AdditionalInfo: User loses its held berry.  See Natural Gift on p.432 for more info.

Name: Nature Power
Description: The Pokemon makes use of the terrain and asks the nature for aid in battle.
AdditionalInfo: The type of this move is determined by the environment. See Nature Power p.432 for more info.

Name: Noble Roar
Description: The Pokemon makes a roar that commands respect and authority over anyone listening.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Strength and Special.

Name: Odor Sleuth
Description: The Pokemon uses its keen smell to detect the foe.
AdditionalInfo: The Foe can not Evade moves performed by the User. User's Normal and Fighting Moves can affect Ghost Types and Ghost Moves can affect Normal Types. Add all Successes from this Move to any Rolls to Track the target.

Name: Pain Split
Description: The user shares its pain with the foe. After a short while it becomes excruciating for the target.
AdditionalInfo: The user gives its Pain Penalizations to the foe. User ignores Pain Penalization effects on itself. For cannot ignore them with Will but it can still ignore its own Pain Penalizations. HP on both remains the same.

Name: Pay Day
Description: This move grants good fortune, making it more likely to get more money after each battle.
AdditionalInfo: At the end of the battle give Money to the Trainer Equal to its Rank: Starter/Beginner - $20.00 Amateur - $50.00 Ace - $75.00 Pro - $100.00

Name: Perish Song
Description: A song of mourning and despair that resonates on the minds of anyone who listens. Makes you feel like you are on your death bed.
AdditionalInfo: After three rounds, if any Pokemon who heard the song is not removed from battle, it will receive its remaining HP as damage. Sound Based.

Name: Play Nice
Description: The user starts playing with the foe in a friendly way. This makes the foe reconsider its aggressive demeanor.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Strength.

Name: Pound
Description: A decent hit to smash the foes.

Name: Present
Description: The user approaches its foe and gives it a lovely present that may be nice or may be a prank.
AdditionalInfo: Roll dice with a 50-50 chance of dealing 2 set damage to the target or recovering 2 HP to the target.

Name: Protect
Description: The user creates an energy shield to deflect a blow. Some Pokemon may even perform an amazing parry to block the incoming attack.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 5. Shield. Reduce 3 Damage this pokemon would receive from a damaging move. Negate effects of Support Moves that target the user. Reduce to zero the set damage from a move the user would take.

Name: Psych Up
Description: The Pokemon mentalizes itself stronger than anyone. They feel good. They can win. They. Can. Do. This.
AdditionalInfo: Copy the Target's Attribute and Trait Modifiers and keep them until the end of the scene.

Name: Quick Attack
Description: An attack as fast as lightning.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 1. Double the Pokemon's movement speed.

Name: Rage
Description: The user gets angry and throws a tantrum at the foe. If the attacker keeps on fighting, it will make the user rage even harder.
AdditionalInfo: If the Pokemon receives damage after using this move. Increase the User's Strength. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

Name: Rapid Spin
Description: The Pokemon spins swiftly to strike the foe. Anything near will be scattered around.
AdditionalInfo: Remove Entry Hazards (Spikes, Stealth Rock, etc.) and Leech Seed from the user's side of the field. Increase user's Dexterity.

Name: Razor Wind
Description: A sharp wind current is unleased against anyone standing against this Pokemon.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical. Charge.

Name: Recover
Description: The Pokemon concentrates on restoring its own cells faster than anything imaginable.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. May cure Lethal Damage.

Name: Recycle
Description: One Pokemon's trash is another one's treasure.
AdditionalInfo: The Pokemon reuses an Item that has already been spent. (Berries etc.) An Item may not be recycled more than 5 times.

Name: Reflect Type
Description: The Pokemon appears to change its own physiology. This effect changes the Type of the user to match another Pokemon in sight.
AdditionalInfo: The Pokemon is now the same type of one of its foes. Lasts for a Scene or until this move is used again.

Name: Refresh
Description: The Pokemon takes a few seconds to cool down and get back in the game.
AdditionalInfo: The User cure itself from Poison, Burn, or Paralysis.

Name: Relic Song
Description: The user sings and dances to a melody so beautiful you won't notice you were crying while listening to it.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based. Roll 1 Die to put the foe to Sleep. If successful, the User may choose to change its form afterwards.

Name: Retaliate
Description: A powerful attack. It will be even stronger if the user just suffered a great loss.
AdditionalInfo: If an ally fainted during this or the last Round, add 3 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool. This effect can only be used once per Ally.

Name: Return
Description: If the Pokemon is treated with care and love, it will return that affection by giving all it's got in battle.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll for every point of Happiness on the User.

Name: Revelation Dance
Description: The Pokemon performa a dance. The dance's energy influences the Type of this Move.
AdditionalInfo: This Move's type will always match the User's first Type.

Name: Roar
Description: A mighty roar that scares the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Low Priority 6. In the wild the battle ends. In an official fight, the Pokemon switches out. If its the last or only Pokemon the move fails. Switcher Move.

Name: Rock Climb
Description: The user climbs on top of the foe. This may be confusing for some Pokemon.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe. Outside of battle it may be used to climb with ease.

Name: Round
Description: The user attacks the foe with a song. If a teammate joins the song the attack will be stronger.
AdditionalInfo: If the User and an Ally are able to use Round, then both may choose to do it at the same time. If they do, both Pokemon add 3 Dice to the Damage Roll.

Name: Safeguard
Description: The Pokemon creates an energy shield that protects everyone from harm.
AdditionalInfo: For the next 4 Rounds, the User and its Allies are immune to Status Ailments (Burn. Poison. Sleep. Confuse. Freeze. Paralysis). Lasts 4 Rounds. Previously inflicted Status Ailments remain.

Name: Scary Face
Description: By making a frightening face, the Pokemon makes others think twice about coming near.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Dexterity by 2.

Name: Scratch
Description: The Pokemon uses its sharp claws to scratch the enemy.

Name: Screech
Description: The user disrupts the fighting stance of its foe by sending a sharp sound to the foe's ears.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Defense by 2. Sound Based.

Name: Secret Power
Description: This move absorbs the energy around the user. It may unleash that power in unexpected ways.
AdditionalInfo: Inflicts abnormal effects. See Secret Power p.432 for more info.

Name: Self Destruct
Description: The Pokemon makes use of its ability to blow up parts of its own body in an impressive display of power.
AdditionalInfo: After performing the move, the user receives damage equal to its remaining HP.

Name: Sharpen
Description: The user cuts down the rough edges of its body to make it as sharp as a razor.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength.

Name: Shell Smash
Description: By breaking its own shell, the user sacrifices defense in exchange of being free to fight with all its power.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength, Special, Dexterity by 2. Reduce the User's Defense and Special Defense by 2.

Name: Simple Beam
Description: The Pokemon sends a small psychic wave to its target, giving it a simpler point of view about the world.
AdditionalInfo: Target Pokemon ability is now "Simple".

Name: Sing
Description: With a charming song, the user lulls its foe to sleep.
AdditionalInfo: Inflict Sleep on the target. Sound Based.

Name: Sketch
Description: The Pokemon draws its foe performing a move. It learns how to perform that move in the process.
AdditionalInfo: Permanently copies a move the target used. Once Copied "Sketch" disappears.

Name: Skull Bash
Description: The Pokemon withdraws to its shell then charges against the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Defense. Charge.

Name: Slack Off
Description: The Pokemon gets lazy and loafs around instead of fighting. This makes up for a short rest.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate.

Name: Slam
Description: The user slams the foe with its tail, vines, etc. to deal a decent amount of damage.

Name: Slash
Description: Using parts of its body as a blade the Pokemon pierces and tears the foe with a vicious force.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical. Lethal.

Name: Sleep Talk
Description: After falling asleep, the Pokemon is still dreaming about the fight.
AdditionalInfo: While this Pokemon is asleep, it may use one of its Moves at random.

Name: Smelling Salts
Description: The Pokemon throws some volatile salts onto the foe's face. A paralyzed Pokemon will get a strong smell.
AdditionalInfo: If the Target is Paralyzed, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool of this Move. After dealing damage, cure the target's Paralysis.

Name: Smokescreen
Description: The user convers its foe with a cloud of smoke. Some Pokemon hide inside this screen while others use it as a cover to escape.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Accuracy.

Name: Snore
Description: After falling asleep the user lets out a powerful snore, disrupting any focus the foe had.
AdditionalInfo: This move can only be used if the user asleep. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe. Sound Based Move.

Name: Soft Boiled
Description: The user boils a freshly layed egg and restores Health with the energy stored within.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate.

Name: Sonic Boom
Description: The Pokemon attacks with a small destructive shock that can go through armor, thick hide, or walls to deal some damage.
AdditionalInfo: This moves always inflicts 1 damage.

Name: Spike Cannon
Description: The Pokemon shoots a wave of pointy projectiles at the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Spit Up
Description: After storing power, the Pokemon spits that energy at the foe. The user returns to its original size.
AdditionalInfo: Must have used the move "Stockpile" prior to this move, otherwise it will fail. Lose all Stockpile modifiers.

Name: Splash
Description: The user just flops splashing some water, this has no effect at all...

Name: Spotlight
Description: The user points a focused light onto one of its allies as if it were on a stage, the ally can't help but catch everyone's attention into itself.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 3. Foes will target One Ally this turn.

Name: Stockpile
Description: The Pokemon swells up by storing power with its mouth, this makes the user a little more resistant to damage.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Defense and Sp. Defense.

Name: Stomp
Description: The Pokemon steps and stomps the foe, the weight may leave the target squashed on the floor.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Strength
Description: The Pokemon strains its muscles to go beyond their own limits.
AdditionalInfo: Outside of battle, using this move allows the Pokemon to lift double the normal weight it should be able to.

Name: Stuff Cheeks
Description: The Pokemon munches its berry but keeps part of it on its cheeks. Looks adorable but it is actually a survival tactic to survive harsh winters.
AdditionalInfo: User eats its held Berry and gains its effects, afterwards, Increase user's Defense by 2.

Name: Substitute
Description: The Pokemon dissapears in a poof of smoke. When the smoke vanishes, an object identical to the user remains in its place to shield it from harm. It looks amazingly real.
AdditionalInfo: Deal 2 Damage to the user and put a decoy with 2 HP with the same Defenses as the user. If the decoy's HP is depleted, it disappears and the user comes back into the fight. Decoy can only be affected by damaging moves.

Name: Super Fang
Description: The Pokemon jumps at the foe to crush it with an awful bite.
AdditionalInfo: Damage Roll is Half of the Foe's remaining HP (up to 10) rounded down. If the remaining HP of the foe is 1 this move fails. Ignore the foe's Defenses.

Name: Supersonic
Description: The Pokemon emits a series of ultrasonic waves that make the foe dizzy and disoriented.
AdditionalInfo: Confuse the foe.

Name: Swagger
Description: The Pokemon enrages the foe with its arrogant demeanor, making it lose focus in battle.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the foe's Strength by 2. Inflicts Confusion.

Name: Swallow
Description: The Pokemon swallows the energy she was storing to restore some damage, it recovers its normal size afterwards.
AdditionalInfo: Must have used the move "Stockpile" prior to this Move, otherwise it will fail. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. User restores 2 Health points. Loses the effects of stockpile. The Pokemon must rest an hour before using Swallow again.

Name: Sweet Scent
Description: The Pokemon releases an aroma that its enemies will love.
AdditionalInfo: Those affected cannot evade moves performed by the user. Attracts wild Pokemon if used outside of battle.

Name: Swift
Description: The user shoots a star shaped light beam that hits the target at blinding speed.
AdditionalInfo: Never Fail.

Name: Swords Dance
Description: The Pokemon makes a dance that raises its battle spirit.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength by 2.

Name: Tackle
Description: A basic attack that consists of charging at an enemy.

Name: Tail Slap
Description: The Pokemon slaps the foe's face with its strong tail.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Tail Whip
Description: The Pokemon moves its tail in such a cute way that the foe will easily let its guard down.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Defense.

Name: Take Down
Description: The Pokemon recklessly grapples the foe to smash it on the ground.
AdditionalInfo: Recoil.

Name: Tearful Look
Description: The Pokemon's eyes start watering as if it were about to cry, it's foe is moved by the tears and loses its will to fight.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce Foe's Strength and Special.

Name: Teatime
Description: The Pokemon gathers everyone for a cup of delicious tea. Not eating a snack along with it would be a waste.
AdditionalInfo: Those affected eat their held berries without gaining their effects. Outside of battle will diffuse violent intentions for a few minutes

Name: Techno Blast
Description: A laser briefly beams away from the Pokemon, whatever it hits explodes a second later. This move can be modified with the right programming of a computer.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. If Genesect is performing this Move, this Move's type may change to: Fire, Ice, Water, or Electric depending on the Driver it has as Held Item.

Name: Teeter Dance
Description: The user starts dancing around with wobbly movements. Friends and foes will get dizzy by trying to follow it.
AdditionalInfo: Inflicts Confusion.

Name: Thrash
Description: The Pokemon rampages and starts to attack and destroy everything on its path.
AdditionalInfo: Rampage.

Name: Tickle
Description: The Pokemon tickles the foe. The laughter really disturbs the foe's fighting stance.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Strength and Defense.

Name: Transform
Description: The user modifies its own DNA structure to become an identical clone of any Pokemon or object it can see.
AdditionalInfo: The user transforms into a copy of its target with same Ability, Attributes, Trait Modifiers, and Moves. Being inside a Pokeball breaks the Transformation.

Name: Tri Attack
Description: The user shoots three beams. Each one is charged with a different kind of energy.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 2 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Burn the foe. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Freeze the Foe.

Name: Trump Card
Description: The more exhausted the user is, the stronger this attack will become. When the Pokemon is at the last of its strength this move can be devastating.
AdditionalInfo: If User's Will is half spent add 1 Dice to the Damage Roll. If the User's Will is depleted add +8 to the Damage Pool.

Name: Uproar
Description: The Pokemon shouts and screams and squaks so hard the noise really hurts the ears. Nobody could get a full night of sleep with all that ruckus.
AdditionalInfo: For the rest of the Round, no Pokemon can fall asleep. If a Pokemon was asleep it wakes up. Sound Based Move.

Name: Veevee Volley
Description: Long sessions playing Volley ball with your Pokemon make it very happy. During battle, it just replaces the ball with its foe.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Die to the Damage Roll for every point of Happiness on the User. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Vice Grip
Description: The Pokemon traps the foe with its pincers or jaws and applies pressure that will leave a nasty bruise.

Name: Weather Ball
Description: The user creates a ball of energy that will use the climate around it to grow in size and power.
AdditionalInfo: If the battlefield is under a Weather, add +2 to the Damage Roll and change the Type of the Move accordingly: Sun-Fire. Rain-Water. Hail-Ice. Sandstorm-Rock. Wind-Flying.

Name: Whirlwind
Description: The Pokemon creates a powerful wind current that swirls the enemy around and sends it flying away.
AdditionalInfo: Low Priority 6. In the wild the battle ends. In an official fight, the Pokemon switches out. If it's the last or only Pokemon the move fails. Switcher Move.

Name: Wish
Description: The Pokemon makes a wish with all its might and somehow it becomes true.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. The move has its effect at the beginning of the next round.

Name: Work Up
Description: The Pokemon excercises with vigor to be physically and mentally prepared for battle.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength and Special.

Name: Wrap
Description: The Pokemon traps its foe with its body or vines, causing some damage.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks. Roll 2 Dice of Damage against the foe at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Wring Out
Description: The Pokemon literally squeezes the life out of its target. As life is fading, squeezing will be harder.
AdditionalInfo: Remove 1 Dice from the Damage Roll for every missing HP of the Target. Up to 4 dice may be removed this way.

Name: Yawn
Description: The user lets out an infectious yawn that will make anyone drowsy enough to fall asleep pretty soon.
AdditionalInfo: If the target is not removed from battle by the start of its next Round, it will fall asleep.

Name: Acid
Description: The Pokemon showers its foes with a corrosive acid, the burning sensation may leave an opening for other attacks.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce Sp. Defense of those affected.

Name: Acid Armor
Description: A liquid acid substance seeps through this Pokemon's body turning it into a liquid-like state. The acid deters foes from touching this Pokemon at full force.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Defense by 2.

Name: Acid Spray
Description: The user spits a corrosive substance, the burning sensation doesn't allow it to focus on attacking.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Special by 2.

Name: Baneful Bunker
Description: The user encloses itself inside its sturdy shell, which is covered by poisonous barbs. If a barb pinches the foe's skin the wound will start to fester.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 4. Shield. If the foe attacked using a Physical Move, it is now Poisoned. Reduce 3 Dice from the Foe's Damage Pool.

Name: Belch
Description: The user lets out a horrible belch on the target. The air contains toxins that deal a terrible damage.
AdditionalInfo: The user must eat something before using this Move.

Name: Clear Smog
Description: The user sucks all gases to clear away all impurities. The target is left heeling hurt, but light headed.
AdditionalInfo: Never Fail. Reset all Increased or Reduced Attributes and Traits of the foe.

Name: Coil
Description: The Pokemon curls up its body. In a calm but menacing position it prepares to deliver its strike.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength, Defense, and Accuracy.

Name: Cross Poison
Description: The Pokemon drenches poison into its pincers to slash the enemy in a brutal way.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Poison the foe.

Name: Gastro Acid
Description: The user spits some of its own gastric juices, the acid prevents the foe from using its special abilities.
AdditionalInfo: Until the end of the Scene, eliminate any effect the foe's Ability would do.

Name: Gunk Shot
Description: The Pokemon shoots a stream of corrosive sludge made with the most toxic substances it can produce. Just inhaling the scent can make you feel very sick.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.

Name: Poison Fang
Description: The Pokemon bites the foe and injects its poison directly through its fangs. After that it just waits for the poison to slowly take care of its foe.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Badly Poison the Foe.

Name: Poison Gas
Description: The Pokemon releases a big cloud of toxic gas, anyone who takes a breath will start coughing violently. They should seek a doctor immediately.
AdditionalInfo: Poison those affected.

Name: Poison Jab
Description: The Pokemon stabs its foe with a sting or tentacle drenched with venom.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.

Name: Poison Powder
Description: The user scatters a small cloud of venomous dust that immediately causes coughing and fever.
AdditionalInfo: Poison the Foe.

Name: Poison Sting
Description: The user shoots a small sting that injects venom into the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Target.

Name: Poison Tail
Description: The tail of this Pokemon is sharp like a blade, it attacks with slashing movements and may release some poison through it.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.

Name: Purify
Description: The Pokemon is covered by a gelatinous goo that can be used to treat several ailments, the Pokemon also uses it as a source of nourishment.
AdditionalInfo: Heal a Target's Status Ailment. If you do then the user may heal 1 HP.

Name: Sludge
Description: The foe is covered with a disgusting sludge, the fumes and toxins on it can make anyone feel sick.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.

Name: Sludge Bomb
Description: The user hurls a ball of toxic sludge that explodes on contact and covers the target.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the Foe.

Name: Sludge Wave
Description: The Pokemon creates a large wave of watery ooze that soaks everything around. The smell is really unpleasant.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Poison those affected.

Name: Smog
Description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 4 Chance Dice Poison the Foe.

Name: Toxic
Description: With a disgusting diet and training, the user learns how to turn its fluids into a deadly toxin.
AdditionalInfo: Badly Poison the Foe.

Name: Toxic Spikes
Description: The user lays a trap of scattered poison spikes that attach to the opponent's feet leaving them with a bad case of fever.
AdditionalInfo: Foe Pokemon that enter the battlefield become Poisoned. Roll 1 Chance Dice for the Poison to become Badly Poisoned instead. Entry Hazard.

Name: Toxic Thread
Description: The user shoots a sticky thread that entangles around the foe, the thread is also laced with a potent toxin that will poison the foe on contact.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce Foe's Dexterity. Poison the Foe.

Name: Venom Drench
Description: Foes are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid that targets their weakened immune systems.
AdditionalInfo: If an affected foe is poisoned or becomes poisoned in the same Round you used this Move then Reduce its Strength, Special, and Dexterity.

Name: Venoshock
Description: The Pokemon shoots a special kind of toxin that reacts violently if the foe is already weakened with poison.
AdditionalInfo: If the Foe is already poisoned, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Name: Agility
Description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Dexterity by 2.

Name: Ally Switch
Description: The user teleports, switching its place with someone.
AdditionalInfo: User switches back. Choose another Pokemon to take its place. It will be ready to fight on the next Round. Switcher Move.

Name: Amnesia
Description: As a fine example of mind over matter, the user temporarily empties its mind to make it more resilient.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Sp. Defense by 2.

Name: Barrier
Description: The user casts a protective field around itself.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Defense by 2.

Name: Calm Mind
Description: The user quietly calms its spirit to strengthen its mind and body.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Special and Sp. Defense.

Name: Confusion
Description: The target's mind is hit by a weak psychic force that leaves them wondering if they were hit by an invisible enemy. Sometimes the foe is left seeing things that aren't really there.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.

Name: Cosmic Power
Description: The user absorbs power from space. This Pokemon glows faintly with energy afterwards.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Defense and Sp. Defense.

Name: Dream Eater
Description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. When the foe wakes up, it will feel weak and empty.
AdditionalInfo: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down. The target must be asleep, this move will fail otherwise.

Name: Extrasensory
Description: The user attacks with an odd, almost invisible power.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Future Sight
Description: The Pokemon foresses something terrible happening to the target. It may see images from its own future without any risk.
AdditionalInfo: Strikes at the end of the next Round. It bypasses any Shield Move and cover. If the target retires or switches out from battle the damage will be dealt to the next opponent or to one of its allies.

Name: Glitzy Glow
Description: The user surrounds itself with a glamorous light, releasing it as a psychic blast, the soft glowing particles remain in the field protecting its fabulousness.
AdditionalInfo: If successful, for the next 4 Rounds the User and Allies will receive 1 less damage from Special Attacks. This effect does not stack. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Gravity
Description: The gravity is intensified, bringing everyone to their knees. Flying pokemon are slammed to the ground.
AdditionalInfo: Flying and Levitating Pokemon can be hit by Ground Type Moves. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Guard Split
Description: The user employs its psychic power to average its resilience with the foe. They both feel like they're equals in terms of toughness.
AdditionalInfo: Average your Defense and Sp. Defense with your target.

Name: Guard Swap
Description: The Pokemon employs its psychic power to make the opponent feel like its got your fraily and make the user ffeel like it got the target's resilience.
AdditionalInfo: Switch your Defense and Sp. Defense with your foe.

Name: Heal Block
Description: The user forces everyone's wounds to stay open by using its immense psychic power.
AdditionalInfo: No one can regain any lost HP. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Heal Pulse
Description: The user emits a pulse of energy that heals the wounds of its allies.
AdditionalInfo: Basic Heal. If successful spend 1 Will to activate.

Name: Healing Wish
Description: The power of ultimate love and sacrifice. The user wishes to completely heal all injuries, diseases, and ailments to save someone's life at the cost of their own health.
AdditionalInfo: The User faints. One Ally is completely healed from all damage and status ailments.

Name: Heart Stamp
Description: This move controls the emotions of the target, making it feel loved and safe. The user may strike immediately.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Heart Swap
Description: The user and the target swap their feelings of powerr and weakness, insecurity and courage, love and hate. Boosts are also swapped.
AdditionalInfo: Switch any Trait Increase/Decrease with the target.

Name: Hyperspace Hole
Description: The user knows the laws of physics bind it from being in many places at once and forbid it from occupying the same space as other bodies. It just disregards their authority.
AdditionalInfo: Ignore Defenses. Never Miss. This Move Bypasses the effects of any Shield Move effect on the foe.

Name: Hypnosis
Description: Employ a hypnotic suggestion to make the target feel drowsy and fall into a deep slumber. Works better on a target that is not in danger.
AdditionalInfo: Put the target to sleep. Dark-Type Pokemon are affected by this move.

Name: Imprison
Description: This move blocks specific parts of the memory the user is well aware of. Be it moves, techniques, names, places, people, or situations. The target won't be able to recall those memories.
AdditionalInfo: The foe cannot use any Moves known by the User. Lasts for a day.

Name: Instruct
Description: The Pokemon sends a psychic command to one of its allies or foes to enable them to repeat their last action.
AdditionalInfo: Selected Target repeats their last move used this Round, taking the successes on the Accuracy Roll of "Instruct" as if they were for their move. Target must have previously used a successful move during the Round. Otherwise "Instruct" will fail.

Name: Kinesis
Description: A basic psychic power to exert force on objects. You can touch, move, press, and affect simple objects to create distractions.
AdditionalInfo: Lower the foe's Accuracy.

Name: Light Screen
Description: The user manifests its mental power on the world, creating walls and floors of light that help prevent the passing of energies.
AdditionalInfo: User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from Special Attacks. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Lunar Dance
Description: The moon shines at the darkest hours, reflecting the sun's lifebringer light on those who fell into the night, taking pity on their lost souls.
AdditionalInfo: The user Faints. One fallen Ally regains consciousness, has its HP fully restored and all Status Ailments healed. If the Ally was not in-battle, it is called out and ready to fight.

Name: Luster Purge
Description: The user engulfs itself in a blinding light and shoots a beam at its foe. This light leaves the foe powerless to resist against anyone.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense. This Effect can be repeated up to 3 times per Target.

Name: Magic Coat
Description: The user quickly creates a barrier that reflects any minor attack, status condition, or dirty triick the foe might have wanted to use.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 4. Redirect the effects of a Support Move that would affect the user or its side of the battlefield towards the foe's (ie. The foe used Stealth Rock, with Magic Coat it will now affect the foe's side instead of yours).

Name: Magic Powder
Description: The Pokemon recites an enchantment and blows a cloud of pink dust on its Target. Afterwards, the target becomes especially good at guessing which card you got from a deck.
AdditionalInfo: Change the target's Type to Psychic.

Name: Magic Room
Description: Inside the effects of Magic Room, technology, tools, and items manually activated do not work. Automated technology will function as normal.
AdditionalInfo: No one can use their Held Item nor any other Item. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Meditate
Description: The Pokemon meditates to unleash a power that's been sleeping deep inside the user.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength

Name: Miracle Eye
Description: The user's sight transcends the flesh and can look directly into the innermost mental pressence of everyone around. Hidden enemies can be detected.
AdditionalInfo: The User may hit Dark Type Pokemon with Psychic Moves. The Pokemon ignores Evasion modifiers. Opponents can't reduce the User's Accuracy.

Name: Mirror Coat
Description: The user canalizes the damage received by energies and bounces them back to their source.
AdditionalInfo: The move only works if the foe just used a Special Attack. Roll the same Damage Pool as your foe's last attack and add 2 Extra Damage Dice. Ignore the foe's Defenses.

Name: Mist Ball
Description: The user engulfs its foe with a cloud of mist. This soothing mist keeps evil intents from surfacing into the foe's mind.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Special. This Effect can be repeated up to 3 times per Target.

Name: Photon Geyser
Description: The Pokemon attacks with a large pillar of light that comes out from where its foe is standing, either the blazing energy  or the crushing strikes are enough to knock someone out.
AdditionalInfo: This Move's Damage Pool, can be rolled with either the Strength or Special Attribute, dealing Physical or Special Damage respectively. Choose whatever is most convenient for the user. If using Special then the move is considered Special instead of Physical.

Name: Photon Geyser (Physical)
AdditionalInfo: This Move's Damage Pool, can be rolled with either the Strength or Special Attribute, dealing Physical or Special Damage respectively. Choose whatever is most convenient for the user.

Name: Photon Geyser (Special)
AdditionalInfo: This Move's Damage Pool, can be rolled with either the Strength or Special Attribute, dealing Physical or Special Damage respectively. Choose whatever is most convenient for the user.

Name: Power Split
Description: The user employs its psychic power to average its capabilities with the foe. They both feel like they're equals in terms of strength.
AdditionalInfo: Average the User's Strength and Special with the target.

Name: Power Swap
Description: The Pokemon employs its psychic power to make the opponent feel like it's got your weaknesses and make the user feel like it's got the target's strength.
AdditionalInfo: Switch your Strength and Special with your foe.

Name: Power Trick
Description: The user's mind is tricked into thinking that strength comes from their vitality, and their vitality is their power.
AdditionalInfo: Switch the User's Strength with its Defense and the User's Special with its Sp. Defense.

Name: Prismatic Laser
Description: Through a prism, the user shoots a concentrated laser beam that pierces everything that comes in contact with it. The effort leaves the user mentally exhausted.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Must Recharge.

Name: Psybeam
Description: Attack with a beam of psychic energy that hits the mind of the target.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.

Name: Psychic
Description: The user's telekinetic force is enough to cause severe harm to their target. This telekinesis is not subtle.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense.

Name: Psychic Fangs
Description: The Pokemon bares its fangs to bite the foe, psychic energy begins piercing before the actual fangs make contact.
AdditionalInfo: If a Barrier is in place on the foe's side (ie. Light Screen. Reflect) destroy it.

Name: Psychic Terrain
Description: The arena becomes radiated by psychic waves. Everyone begins to think slowly due to the buzz in their heads, making all tasks take more time.
AdditionalInfo: For the next 4 Rounds, all Psychic Attacks will deal 1 Extra Dice of Damage. No Pokemon on the ground can use moves with increased Priority.

Name: Psycho Boost
Description: The Pokemon releases an explosion of all of its concentrated psychic power in a devastating explosion, afterwards the user will be extremely tired.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Reduce User's Special by 2.

Name: Psycho Cut
Description: Create blades of psychic energy to tear down foes.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical.

Name: Psycho Shift
Description: With psychic suggestion, the target feels afflicted by the same status problems as the user.
AdditionalInfo: Transfer the User's Status Ailments to the target. The user is now cured.

Name: Psyshock
Description: Materialize a psychic wave that pushes the target with real physical force.
AdditionalInfo: This Move is resisted with the Foe's Defense instead of its Sp. Defense

Name: Psystrike
Description: Through sheer psychic power, the user materializes its energy to deal a heavy strike to its foe.
AdditionalInfo: This Move is resisted with the Foe's Defense instead of its Sp. Defense

Name: Psywave
Description: Releases the inner power of the mind to emanate psychic waves that hurt the target.
AdditionalInfo: Roll Damage Dice according to the User's Rank. 1 Dice at Starter Rank. 2 Dice at Beginner Rank. 3 dice at Amateur Rank. 4 Dice at Ace Rank. 5 Dice at Professional Rank. Ignores Defense.

Name: Reflect
Description: The user manifests its mental power on the world, creating invisible walls and floors that prevent the passing of objects.
AdditionalInfo: User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from Physical Attacks. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Rest
Description: The user falls asleep. During this period the body benefits from a super accelerated healing process.
AdditionalInfo: Complete Heal. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. The User must Sleep for a whole Round (from Round Start to Round End).

Name: Role Play
Description: The user mimics the target and takes on the most basic features from that character.
AdditionalInfo: Copy the target's Ability. The abilities Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder Guard, and Plot Device cannot be copied.

Name: Skill Swap
Description: The user swaps its identity with the target, making both feel like they are from each other's species.
AdditionalInfo: Switch Abilities with the foe. The abilities Flower Gift. Illusion. Imposter. Stance Change. Wonder Guard. Plot Device and others cannot be switched.

Name: Speed Swap
Description: The Pokemon employs its psychic power to make the opponent perceive events as if they were happening faster or slower according to the user's own speed.
AdditionalInfo: Switch your Dexterity with your Foe.

Name: Stored Power
Description: This move allows the user to release its power. If the user has any boosts, the damage is increased.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Extra Dice of Damage for each Increased attribute the user has (ie. Clefairy has 1 Increased Point in Defense and 1 Evasion. Stored Power will have 2 Extra Dice on the Damage Pool). Up to 7 Dice may be added.

Name: Synchronoise
Description: The user vibrates with any particular energy Type he chooses. All nearby creatures and objects of that Type are hurt.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based. Choose a Type (Fire, Poison, Steel, etc.) this move only affects those with that Type.

Name: Telekinesis
Description: The user can manipulate objects and creatures with his mind. Pokemon and humans become easier to hit because their movements are restrained.
AdditionalInfo: All attacks against the target have "Never Fail". The target is immune to Ground Moves. Lasts 2 Rounds.

Name: Teleport
Description: Teleport the user and one more creature to a place of tranquility and high psychic resonance such as Pokemon Centers. Ceilings and walls block this move from working.
AdditionalInfo: In the wild, the battle ends. In official battles, it counts as the Pokemon being recalled. Teleportation distances depend on Special and Storyteller's discretion.

Name: Trick
Description: Control the target's mind to perform a simple non-hostile action, such as walking or handling an item.
AdditionalInfo: The foe and the user swap Held Items.

Name: Trick Room
Description: This reality altering move can manipulate time, so slow creatures are fast, and fast creatures are slow.
AdditionalInfo: Invert the order of Initiative. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Wonder Room
Description: Inside the Wonder Room, a strong mind makes a strong body and a resilient body makes a resilient mind. However, if the mind is weak, the body will be weak and vice-versa.
AdditionalInfo: Defense and Sp. Defense will be calculated with Insight instead of Vitality. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Zen Headbutt
Description: The user focuses its will on its head to strike with a headbutt.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Accelerock
Description: The Pokemon dashes at great speed using the rocks on its body to strike its foe upon impact.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 1.

Name: Ancient Power
Description: the Pokemon calls upon an energy fron ancient times that strikes the foe and may infuse the user with a primal strength.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Strength, Dexterity, Special, Defense, and Sp. Defense.

Name: Diamond Storm
Description: The Pokemon summons a storm of diamonds over the field, these diamonds also serve as barriers the user can take cover into.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Defense by 2.

Name: Head Smash
Description: The user charges head first to attack the foe, the strike is devastating for both.
AdditionalInfo: Recoil.

Name: Power Gem
Description: The user attacks with a ray of light that comes out of the gem on its body.

Name: Rock Blast
Description: The Pokemon shoots and throws small rock pebbles that burst into tiny pieces as they touch the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions.

Name: Rock Polish
Description: The user polishes the rough ends of its rock body for easier and faster movement.
AdditionalInfo: Increase User's Dexterity by 2.

Name: Rock Slide
Description: The Pokemon creates a slide of falling rocks against its foes that may leave them crushed below the rubble.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch those affected.

Name: Rock Throw
Description: The user picks up a rock or pebble and throws it at the foe.

Name: Rock Tomb
Description: The Pokemon covers the foe in gravel and rocks, leaving it unable to move freely.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce Foe's Dexterity.

Name: Rock Wrecker
Description: The user shoots a huge boulder as if it were a cannon ball that can even go through thick walls. This, however, requires a lot of energy from the user.
AdditionalInfo: Must Recharge. Lethal.

Name: Rollout
Description: The user curls up into a ball and starts rolling towards its foe, trampling everything in its way.
AdditionalInfo: Successive Actions. Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of the last Rollout hit the user performs. If the Pokemon used Defense Curl this Round, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Roll of every hit.

Name: Sandstorm
Description: The Pokemon casts a fierce wind that carries millions of rough sand particles.
AdditionalInfo: Sandstorm Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.

Name: Smack Down
Description: The user hurls a projectile, usually a heavy rock that sends the foe down to the ground, leaving it unable to take off the ground afterwards.
AdditionalInfo: Remove the foe's Immunity to Ground-Type Attacks.

Name: Stealth Rock
Description: The Pokemon hides sharp and point rocks all over the foe's side of the battlefield.
AdditionalInfo: Entry Hazard. Foe Pokemon that enter the battlefield lose 1 HP. This effect does not stack.

Name: Stone Edge
Description: The user hurls sharp stones at the foe. The speed and weight of the stones deals a severe amount of damage.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical. Lethal.

Name: Tar Shot
Description: The Pokemon gushes a blob of black tar over its foe. The unfortunate voctim can barely move afterwards, keep it away from fire sources, tar is extrmely flammable.
AdditionalInfo: Reduce the foe's Dexterity. Until the end of the Scene Fire Type Moves will deal Super-Effective damage against the foe.

Name: Wide Guard
Description: The Pokemon uses its whole body to provide coverage and protection to its allies against an incoming attack.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 3. Shield. Reduce 3 Damage the User and Allies would receive from a damaging move. Reduce to zero the set damage from a move the User and Allies would take.

Name: Anchor Shot
Description: The Pokemon hurls an anchor towards its foe and entangles it with seaweed, the anchor drags the foe down so it cannot escape.
AdditionalInfo: Blocks.

Name: Autotomize
Description: The Pokemon sheds pieces and starts rotating other parts of its body for easier and lighter movement.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Dexterity by 2. User's weight is halved for the rest of Scene.

Name: Behemoth Bash
Description: The Pokemon becomes a giant energy shield that tramples everything in its wake. If the foe is under the effects of the Dynamax phenomenon all its energy will be swept away.
AdditionalInfo: If the Foe is under the effects of Dynamax, This Move becomes Lethal and you add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Name: Behemoth Blade
Description: The Pokemon becomes a giant sword with a razor-sharp blade. If the foe is under the effects of the Dynamax phenomenon all its energy will be slashed to bits.
AdditionalInfo: If the Foe is under the effects of Dynamax, This Move becomes Lethal and you add 4 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Name: Bullet Punch
Description: The user launches itself against the foe to strike it with an iron fist.
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. Priority 1.

Name: Doom Desire
Description: Be careful what you wish for, this Pokemon will read your most intimate wishes and make them come true in very twisted ways.
AdditionalInfo: Strikes at the end of the Round after the next. Bypass Shield Moves and Cover. If the target retires or switches out from battle, the damage will be dealt to the next opponent or to one of its allies. Extra effects may be added at Storyteller's Discretion

Name: Double Iron Bash
Description: The user hardens its limbs and then rotates them at great speed to hit the foe twice in a row. The blow can leave the victim crushed on the floor.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.

Name: Flash Cannon
Description: The Pokemon absorbs the reflecting light on its body, releasing a powerful beam against the foe.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Sp. Defense.

Name: Gear Grind
Description: The user traps the foe between its gears and crushes it with two painful grinds.
AdditionalInfo: Double Action.

Name: Gear Up
Description: The user engages its gears on an ally to leave the ally's body working like a welloiled machine.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the Strength and Special of one Steel-Type or Electric-Type Ally.

Name: Gyro Ball
Description: The user curls up in a ball and spins against the target at a high speed.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage pool for every point of Dexterity the Foe has that surpasses the user's. Up to 5 Dice may be added this way.

Name: Heavy Slam
Description: The user slams the foe usin its whole body weight. Smaller foes will be deeply affected.
AdditionalInfo: Add 1 Extra Dice for every 50 kgs. of weight above the target's weight, up to +4 Extra Dice.

Name: Iron Defense
Description: The Pokemon hardens its body surface as if it was made from the strongest iron around.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Defense by 2.

Name: Iron Head
Description: The Pokemon charges at the foe with a brutal headbutt that may leave the target knocked down on the ground.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the Foe.

Name: Iron Tail
Description: The user hits the foe with its hardened tail. The target is left vulnerable against subsequent attacks.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Defense.

Name: King's Shield
Description: The Pokemon uses a ghostly shield to protect itself. If the foe managed to touch it, the user will drain some of its lifeforce.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 3. Shield. If the foe was using a Physical Move. Reduce the foe's Strength by 2. Reduce 3 Dice from the foe's Damage Pool.

Name: Magnet Bomb
Description: The Pokemon hurls a metal bomb that is attracted to the target like a magnet. The moment it touches the foe, it will explode.
AdditionalInfo: Never Fail.

Name: Metal Burst
Description: After receiving damage, the user bursts the tiny but sharp metal piece that came loose because of the foe's attack. The greater the impact the more metal it will shoot.
AdditionalInfo: This Move only works if the foe just used an attack. Roll the same Damage Pool as your foe's last attack and add 2 Extra Damage Dice.

Name: Metal Claw
Description: The Pokemon attacks using its sharp claws, the friction may leave them even sharper.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the user's Strength.

Name: Metal Sound
Description: The user produces a horrible noise that impedes the foe from focusing on the fight, leaving it vulnerable to attacks.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based. Reduce the foe's Special Defense by 2.

Name: Meteor Mash
Description: The user charges with a strong fist and strikes like a meteor.
AdditionalInfo: Fist Based. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Strength.

Name: Mirror Shot
Description: The user dazes the foe with a beam of light. Those who have experienced it describe it as
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.

Name: Shift Gear
Description: The Pokemon has its gears rotate quickly,. Working like a powerful machine.
AdditionalInfo: Increase the User's Strength by 1 and Dexterity by 2.

Name: Smart Strike
Description: The user stabs the foe using one of its sharp horns with astounding precision, the resulting wound will be very deep and must be treated immediately.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Never Fail.

Name: Steel Beam
Description: A concentrated ray of light that is capable of melting even the thickest steel plates. Unfortunately the user will also have trouble handling this power.
AdditionalInfo: Recoil.

Name: Steel Wing
Description: The Pokemon uses its sharp feathers as if they were razors.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Increase the User's Defense.

Name: Sunsteel Strike
Description: You suddenly stop your in tracks as you see a bright and blinding light coming towards you at great speed. You did not see what hit you and then it's all darkness.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. If anything on the foe's side of the field would prevent this move from dealing damage (Pokemon types. Abilities. Shield Moves. Weather. Or Barriers.) ignore it. This Move cannot be Clashed.

Name: Aqua Jet
Description: The user propels itself with a blast of water and strikes at high speed.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 1.

Name: Aqua Ring
Description: The user coats itself in a ring of special flowing water that lessens the pain.
AdditionalInfo: If successful spent 1 Will point to activate. At the end of each Round, recover 1 HP. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Aqua Tail
Description: The user swings its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Bouncy Bubble
Description: The user shoots bubbles at its target, the bubbles fill up with fresh water upon contact and bounce back towards the user. Should you drink the water inside? Who cares? It's fun!
AdditionalInfo: The user restores HP equal to half the damage dealt, rounded down. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Brine
Description: The user blasts the foe with extremely dense water, if the target is tired he may be swept away easily by the pressure.
AdditionalInfo: If the foe is at half HP or less, add 3 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Name: Bubble
Description: A spray of bubbles flies around the enemies, some of the bubbles stick to their bodies hindering their movement.
AdditionalInfo: Target all foes in range. Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the Dexterity of those affected.

Name: Bubble Beam
Description: A long stream of bubbles hits the foe, the bubble foam may prevent the target from moving freely.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Dexterity.

Name: Clamp
Description: The user traps and crushes the opponent using its thick and sturdy shell.
AdditionalInfo: Block. Deal 2 Dice of Damage at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Crabhammer
Description: A large pincer strikes with the power of a hammer. The demolition power is incredible.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical.

Name: Dive
Description: The user submerges into the water and continues diving at an insane speed.
AdditionalInfo: Charge Move. While charging this move, the User will be out of range. Allows the Pokemon to swim into Deep Waters.

Name: Fishious Rend
Description: This Pokemon uses its gills to snap at its target, even if they don't have teeth, they can have a crushing strength.
AdditionalInfo: If the foe has not had its Turn this Round, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool.

Name: Hydro Cannon
Description: The Pokemon blasts the foe with a water surge that could bring down a house. The user needs to res afterwards.
AdditionalInfo: Must Recharge.

Name: Hydro Pump
Description: The user builds up pressure inside its body and then releases a tremendous amount of water at the target.

Name: Life Dew
Description: The user creates a fresh-water dew that makes it and its allies full of energy.
AdditionalInfo: If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. User and Allies in Range heal 1 HP at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Liquidation
Description: The Pokemon gets close to its foe then strikes while bursting a full-force blast of pressurized water, the water may cut or dent through the foe's armor.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Roll 2 Chance Dice to Reduce the Foe's Defense.

Name: Muddy Water
Description: The user fills its mouth with dirt and spits a torrent of mud at the foes. This mud may get in the eyes of the enemies.
AdditionalInfo: All Foes in Range. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Reduce the Accuracy of those affected.

Name: Octazooka
Description: The user sprays ink at the target's face to obstruct its vison.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 5 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Accuracy.

Name: Origin Pulse
Description: The Pokemon sends a giant pulse underwater that creates a chain reaction and causes water to move in large streams. It is believed that all water in the sea moves thanks to this.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal.

Name: Rain Dance
Description: The user performs a curious mystic dance that summons a heavy rainfall.
AdditionalInfo: Rain Weather is activated for the next 4 Rounds.

Name: Razor Shell
Description: The Pokemon uses its sharp shell as a weapon to cut the target's fur, armor or anything protecting its body.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Reduce the foe's Defense.

Name: Scald
Description: The user shoots a torrent of boiling water, it may leave the foe sopping with burns.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Burn the foe.

Name: Snipe Shot
Description: The User Shoots a piercing water jet with incredible precision.
AdditionalInfo: High Critical. Ignore effects from Moves or Abilities that would prevent this Move from targeting a foe.

Name: Soak
Description: The user shoots a stream of water and moisture that clings to the foe's body as an overcoat.
AdditionalInfo: Change the target's Type to Water.

Name: Sparkling Aria
Description: The Pokemon sings a beautiful melody, the song comes out as a sparkling fountain, bursting upon impact and quenching any fire in its path.
AdditionalInfo: Sound Based. Area Attack. If an affected Pokemon had any of the Burn Status Conditions, heal it instead of dealing damage.

Name: Splishy Splash
Description: The Pokemon rides a giant surge of electricity as if surfing. It looks incredibly rad but it is also dangerous, as electricity does not share the same properties of water for safe surfing.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze the foe. If the user of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this move fails.

Name: Steam Eruption
Description: In less than a second, the sound of steam boiling over a raging engine thunders through the ears of the foe before it is shot through the sky by a scalding geyser.
AdditionalInfo: Lethal. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Apply Burn 2 to those affected.

Name: Surf
Description: A giant wave of water sweeps the area while the user swims on top of it.

Name: Water Gun
Description: The user learns to shoot water with enough force to hurt the foe.

Name: Water Pledge
Description: The Pokemon chants to invoke the power of Water. Moisture in the air bends the light to create an inspiring rainbow. Everyone in the field is sure to give its best.
AdditionalInfo: Creates a rainbow that adds 2 Dice to all Chance Dice rolls. This effect lasts 4 turns.

Name: Water Pulse
Description: The Pokemon attacks with a pulsing blast of water, this leaves the foe feeling dizzy.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Confuse the foe.

Name: Water Shuriken
Description: The Pokemon quickly throws sharp jets of water in the shape of a shuriken.
AdditionalInfo: Priority 1. Successive Actions.

Name: Water Sport
Description: The user soaks the battlefield with moisture, making it harder for fire attacks to ignite.
AdditionalInfo: For the next 4 Rounds Fire Type attacks won't add their Power to the Damage Pool.

Name: Water Spout
Description: The Pokemon builds up an amazing pressure and releases a huge columnar vortex of water that could even reach the clouds.
AdditionalInfo: Remove 1 Dice of Damage for every missing HP of the User. Up to 5 Dice may be reduced this way.

Name: Waterfall
Description: The Pokemon may swim with such strength that it may even swim upwards in a waterfall.
AdditionalInfo: Roll 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Whirlpool
Description: Trap the foe inside a violent swirling whirlpool that makes the foe unable to escape the battle.
AdditionalInfo: Block. Deal 2 dice of damage at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds.

Name: Withdraw
Description: The user hides inside its hard shell to protect itself from incoming attacks.
AdditionalInfo: Increase User's Defense.

Name: Any Move
AdditionalInfo: This move represents every possible move. Metronome but better.

Name: Struggle (Physical)
AdditionalInfo: The most basic attack.

Name: Struggle (Special)
AdditionalInfo: The most basic attack.

Name: Grapple
AdditionalInfo: The foe is Blocked. Foe can resist this Maneuver by rolling their Strength or Dexterity score and scoring the same or more successes than the user.

Name: Help Another
AdditionalInfo: Roll your Accuracy as if it was Chance Dice. If Successful, add one die to the Action of an Ally. Up to 6 dice may be added this way.

Name: Cover An Ally
AdditionalInfo: The user will provide cover to the target from  attacks and is more likely to be hit by close-range attacks. The level of Cover the user provides will depend on its size.

Name: Stabilize An Ally
AdditionalInfo: The User applies CPR and/or first aid to an unconcious Ally. Target won't receive Lethal Damage each hour anymore. Each Lethal Damage on the Ally reduces 1 Success to the Accuracy Pool of this Maneuver.

Name: Run Away
AdditionalInfo: The User runs away from the battlefield. This effect ends the battle. Foes might try to prevent this by rolling: Dexterity + Athletic and scoring the same or more successes. If the user is Blocked this Maneuver fails.

Name: Poltergeist
Description: This move is missing

Name: Expanding Force
Description: This move is missing

Name: Shell Side Arm
Description: This move is missing

Name: Eerie Spell
Description: This move is missing

Name: Freezing Glare
Description: This move is missing

Name: Thunderous Kick
Description: This move is missing

Name: Fiery Wrath
Description: This move is missing
